name: Puff
longDescription: Puff the Fractal Dragon is here, contemplating a higher reality.
detailedDescription:
Is that some type of differential curve involving some strange, and
unknown calculus that she seems to be made out of?

name: the clone
longDescription: A boring old clone is standing here.
detailedDescription: This clone is nothing to look at.  No, really, it is quite boring.

name: the zombie
longDescription: A strange humanoid is here.  How odd, its flesh seems to be falling off!
detailedDescription:
This strange humanoid is moving rather slowly, and appears to be
a corpse, a walking corpse!  It must be a zombie or something of
the sort.

name: the aerial servant
longDescription: An amorphous shape is floating in the air.
detailedDescription:
As you stare at this amorphous shape, it begins to appear to take
the shape of a cloud-like humanoid.

name: the elemental
longDescription: An elemental is standing patiently here.
detailedDescription:
This creature is the essence of the elements, and appears to be
waiting patiently for something to occur.

name: the homba
longDescription: The homba flits about.
detailedDescription: Part kestrel, part bear, part wolf.  Parts is parts, and makes an ugly whole.

name: the swordsman
longDescription: The greatest swordsman in the land is standing here with a sneer on his face.
detailedDescription: This is the ultimate swordsman.

name: the Mummy of Rabscuttle
longDescription: The Mummy of Rabscuttle wanders here, hands aloft, walking towards you.
detailedDescription: All bandages, no personality.

name: the giant lizard
longDescription: A giant lizard is here.
detailedDescription:
This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to its underground
habitat.  He looks very powerful.

name: General Woundwort
longDescription: General Woundwort, the dark demon of Minos, awaits to maul you to shreds.
detailedDescription: He looks vaguely like a rabbit, but sure doesn't act like one.

name: Franz the Henchman
longDescription: Franz, Minos' henchman, is here ready to pump you up.
detailedDescription:
Franz is no girlie man.  He is very muscular and looks as if he could
squeeze your head like a grapefruit.

name: Hanz the Henchman
longDescription: Hanz is here flexing his muscles and squeezing grapefruits.
detailedDescription:
Hanz is no girlie man.  He is very muscular and looks as if he could
lift a large dragon.

name: King Minos the Minotaur
longDescription: King Minos the Minotaur is ready and waiting to gore you to death.
detailedDescription: He smells something awful.

name: the dragon turtle
longDescription: A large dragon turtle breaks the surface churning the water into huge waves.
detailedDescription: The turtle's shell is the size of a small house and looks as hard as rock.

name: the sea hag
longDescription: You notice the face of an ugly hag in the sea weeds.
detailedDescription: The sea hag is terribly fightful and has razor sharp teeth.

name: the merman
longDescription: There is a merman swimming here brandishing his trident at you!
detailedDescription: The merman has a powerful tail fin instead of legs.

name: the crusty crab
longDescription: A crusty looking crab is crawling around here searching for food.
detailedDescription: It looks like a crab... what more can be said?

name: the Immortal Innkeeper
longDescription: The Immortal Innkeeper is organizing her books here.
detailedDescription: She appears to be having no problem tallying things up.

name: the Immortal Postmaster
longDescription: The Immortal Postmaster is hard at work here.
detailedDescription: Scary... a postal worker... working?

name: the wandering spirit
longDescription: A strange amorphous being wanders these halls eternally cleaning.
detailedDescription:
This spirit, having lived out its days in the mortal world, now
works off its final sins by doing menial labour in this realm's
purgatory.  In this case, those chores seem to be cleaning up
after the immortals of the land.

name: Allah
longDescription: You resist the urge to avert your eyes from the sight of the one true God.
detailedDescription:
The sight is for each man a different, a mirror into the true nature of
each person's body and soul.  At first a proud, bitter old man, but just
as easily a gentle extended hand, a smile, and gardens... gardens.

name: Michael
longDescription: The archangel Michael turns and begins to look you over.
detailedDescription:
At first you see nothing but a bright and comforting glow; then the
image sharpens suddenly, and you see a face, eyes, hands, but then
that too fades, and you see nothing.

name: Gabriel
longDescription: The archangel Gabriel smiles, and begins to tell you something.
detailedDescription:
Known as the Messenger, it is this angel that has brought the Divine Word
to the chosen prophets, and in turn brought the Seal of the Prophets on a
miraculous journey to the holy city of Jerusalem.

name: Raphael
longDescription: The archangel Raphael looks up and frowns at you in disapproval.
detailedDescription:
It is impossible to get a solid glance at the archangel.  He is nothing
that is human, and with a mere whisper, he dispels every image that you
attempt to create in your mind.

name: Uriel
longDescription: Uriel, the angel of darkness, stands here guarding the way forward.
detailedDescription:
After the Fall of the bringer of light, the Lord had need for the
service of a fourth, and it was this angel, Uriel, that rose to the
highest ranks.

name: the cherubin
longDescription: The cherubin of the blazing sword looks at you and begins to chuckle.
detailedDescription:
The monster before you seems to be nothing more than a baby or young
child, wrapped in a glowing white cloth, but as you try to walk past,
the beast grins and cackles, drawing its sword and blocking the way.

name: the jester
longDescription: A mad, drunken jester is sitting here, lost in his deepening stupor.
detailedDescription:
He is dimly aware of your gaze.  Chuckling softly, you hear him mutter
something obscure: dragons, the temple, the falling of great empires.
He laughs at you and takes another drink.

name: the jinn
longDescription: One of the jinn dances in and out of the air before your eyes, taunting you.
detailedDescription:
You have heard legends of these creatures, the mischievous little demons
said to be trapped in lamps and bottles, capable of granting all kinds of
powerful wishes.  To you, it looks like nothing more than an annoying little
sprite.

name: the slumped old man
longDescription: A slumped, shaking old man stands up and begins to yell at the world.
detailedDescription:
He wears a faded uniform, decorated with honors of his own creation,
slackened jaws and pasty white bags sagging under his ugly, hating eyes.
A tuft of reckless dark hair scatters across his forehead, and his right
hand shakes and shakes.

name: al-Hakim
longDescription: The mad Caliph al-Hakim is here, dissecting a young boy.
detailedDescription:
The darkest skin, and eyes so white.  Covered only in a shoddy woolen
tunic, he has not bathed in months nor eaten in days, and yet his smile,
so charming.

name: Judas Escariot
longDescription: The wayward apostle approaches slowly, extending his arms in a hug.
detailedDescription: You see nothing but the sadness of a man who would sell his own God.

name: Pharoah
longDescription: Pharoah has been sent here in retribution for a lifetime of evils.
detailedDescription:
Richly clothed and postured in arrogance and love of power, he looks at
you with nothing more than a smirk of contempt.

name: Abu Bakr
longDescription: Abu Bakr, first of the Rashidun, mourns over the death of the Prophet.
detailedDescription:
You see a simple man, dressed in dark and unadorned robes, bent over and
pensive, reliving the memories of a man he never thought would die.

name: Umar
longDescription: You see Umar, second of the Rashidun, the successors of the Prophet.
detailedDescription:
You are amazed at the piety of the man.  He looks at you in sadness,
saying: "I do not wish to fight you, but if you refuse the truth of
the Word, then I must."

name: Uthman
longDescription: The third of the rightly-guided Caliphs, Uthman, stands before you.
detailedDescription:
He was chosen as leader by a clique of jealous rivals who could agree
upon no other.  The memory of the Prophet fading quickly from the minds
of the faithful, he could do little, and was in the end killed by his
enemies.

name: Ali
longDescription: You have come before Ali, fourth and last of the Rashidun.
detailedDescription:
Some view him as the closest to God among all of the Caliphs, the one
most deserving of our respect and reverence.  Still others saw him as
a schismatic, a heretic, one to be killed and forgotten.  To look at
him now is for you to decide for yourself.

name: Iblis
longDescription: You gaze in awe at the most beautiful of all angels, Iblis, the Fallen.
detailedDescription:
He smiles calmly, and begins to tell you of the time when he would not
kneel, would not prostrate himself before the first human beings.  And
then he gestures at you, smiling, and conjures an image of all the
temptations that will be yours if you in turn but follow him.

name: the Temptation
longDescription: You pause nervously as a voice whispers at you from over your shoulder.
detailedDescription:
There is no physical figure attached to the presence that dominates this
place, just tormented laughter, moaning, screaming, and begging.

name: the raging dragon
longDescription: A raging dragon turns to you in violent lust for your soul.
detailedDescription:
The serpent of babylon, the aged and violet hued monster that has
watched all of mankind succumb before its power, turns to you as
its last victim.

name: the demon
longDescription: The hell-fire around you is dominated by a massive, burning demon.
detailedDescription:
You see nothing but the inexorably red and burning anger of the
lord of the underworld that you fear to be your fate.

name: the innocent baby
longDescription: Lying on the ground wrapped in blankets is the most innocent of babies.
detailedDescription:
The baby is barely aware of your presence, lost in a sleepy and
contented yawn.

name: the teenage boy
longDescription: You stop in surprise at the sight of a teenage boy staring off to the distance.
detailedDescription:
He is young, and has not yet seen the bloodiness of this world.  You follow
his gaze and notice that he is gazing in wonderment at the fullness of the
moon.

name: the man
longDescription: A middle-aged man is here, kneeling in prayer.
detailedDescription:
He is tired, the lines of age marking his face, but in his robe,
kneeling, he is the image of perfect contentment.

name: the bodyless soul
longDescription: You are overwhelmed by the presence of a soul that has transcended its body.
detailedDescription:
You sense certain tastes and smells, the winds through the gardens.
Nothing can explain or describe this perfection, this utter bliss.

name: the shadow guardian
longDescription: A shadow guardian screams a challenge and attacks.
detailedDescription: It seems to be made of nothing more than darkness...

name: the lost adventurer
longDescription: An emaciated adventurer is here looking lost and hopeless.
detailedDescription: He looks haggard and sickly; no doubt he's been lost here for quite some time.

name: Edgar
longDescription: Edgar the Human Swordpupil is standing here, looking quite lost.
detailedDescription:
Edgar says 'pardon me, can you tell me where to buy cups?'

You see before you, one of Midgaard's finest fighting elite, the mighty
bunny slayer himself, Edgar the Horrible!

name: the diamond golem
longDescription: A huge diamond golem is standing guard here.
detailedDescription: It looks quite strong.

name: the mage
longDescription: A young mage wanders about, oblivious to all.
detailedDescription:
He seems to be contemplating life, love and the mysteries of the universe.
Then again, he may just have a headache.

name: Strick the bartender
longDescription: Strick is here levitating drinks to his customers.
detailedDescription: He looks rather harmless, but then again so does a sleeping dragon.

name: Tatorious
longDescription: Tatorious the wizard is here counting his earnings.
detailedDescription: Tatorious winks at you mischievously.

name: Ezmerelda
longDescription: Ezmerelda the cook is here stirring a large pot of something.
detailedDescription:
She does not look like the typical cook you would find in a kitchen,
but she certainly fits what you would expect in a tower fulls of
mages.

name: the cook's assistant
longDescription: The cook's assistant is here assisting the cook.
detailedDescription: This young man is busy adding strange ingredients to the large pot.

name: the prisoner
longDescription: A prisoner is chained to the wall here.
detailedDescription:
Though his clothes are all in rags, you can see that at one time they
must have been fine garments.  A metal muzzle has been fitted over the
poor wretch's mouth, whether to keep him from screaming, or to silence
his spell casting you cannot tell.

He looks quite mad, no doubt he has been mistreated horribly.

name: the Jailor
longDescription: The Jailor is here enjoying a comfortable nap.
detailedDescription: He looks rather dirty.

name: the broom
longDescription: A straw broom is here leaning against the wall.
detailedDescription: The broom screams 'Take that you lout!'

name: the pair of disembodied hands
longDescription: A pair of disembodied hands floats in the air here.
detailedDescription: The hands twitch with anticipation of strangling someone.

name: the pair of disembodied eyes
longDescription: A pair of disembodied eyes floats here glaring at you.
detailedDescription: The eyes smoulder with hatred.

name: the mage
longDescription: A visiting mage is here snoring away in peaceful slumber.
detailedDescription: He looks quite sleepy.

name: the young apprentice magic user
longDescription: A young apprentice magic user is here doing magical studies.
detailedDescription: She looks quite intent on her studies.

name: the young apprentice
longDescription: A young apprentice is here mumbling words of magic to himself.
detailedDescription: He looks to be oblivious to all but the spell he is memorizing.

name: the young apprentice
longDescription: A young apprentice is sleeping here.
detailedDescription: He seems to be dreaming.

name: the young apprentice
longDescription: A young apprentice is here teasing a cornered kitten.
detailedDescription: He looks like a mischievous youth.

name: the small kitten
longDescription: A small kitten is here meowing in terror.
detailedDescription:
The little ball of fur looks very unhappy.  Singed fur and a few minor
burns mark its mottled coat.

name: the student
longDescription: A student of spells is here looking quite bored.
detailedDescription: The student yawns.

name: the instructor of magic
longDescription: The instructor screams at your interruption and attacks you.
detailedDescription: He looks quite angry at your interruption.

name: the student of spells
longDescription: A student of spells is here trying to master invisibility.
detailedDescription: He blinks in and out of existence, trying to master the spell.

name: the spell teacher
longDescription: A spell teacher screams at your interruption and attacks.
detailedDescription: The teacher is quite fierce and rather frightening.

name: the student of spells
longDescription: A student of spells has fallen asleep at her desk here.
detailedDescription: She looks to have collapsed from sheer boredom.

name: the wizard
longDescription: An old wizard is here making a speech here.
detailedDescription:
This wizzened old man looks like he could easily pass for the oldest
living man.  Of course, having heard stories about some of the magic
available to the people living here, and what toll the magic draws...
this man might be as young as you.

name: the young mage
longDescription: A young mage is here learning hand to hand combat.
detailedDescription:
This young fellow looks quite confident in his abilities to defend
himself.

name: the battle mistress
longDescription: The battle mistress is here teaching the fine uses of a dagger.
detailedDescription:
She looks quite rugged. In fact, she more resembles a warrior than a magic
user.

name: the spell teacher
longDescription: A spell teacher is here relaxing.
detailedDescription:
The teacher looks to be worn out by a long day of magic working, difficult
spells, and inattentive students.

name: the aged wizard
longDescription: An aged wizard is sleeping here.
detailedDescription:
Dreams of magic and power are probably flowing through his head right
now, better not wake him up.

name: the scribe
longDescription: A scribe is here working on some manuscripts.
detailedDescription:
He appears to be copying out some spell ingredients or components right
now.

name: the scribe
longDescription: A scribe is here working diligently on some translations.
detailedDescription:
She is quite cute.  Too bad her only interest seems to be the words of
lore she is translating.

name: the Master Scribe
longDescription: The Master Scribe is here looking a little upset
detailedDescription:
He seems to be so old, his skin has become nothing but a giant wrinkle.
The master scribe screams 'How dare you interrupt my important work???'

name: the scribe's assistant
longDescription: The scribe's assistant is here folding parchments.
detailedDescription:
You can tell that he isn't trusted with the more important documents,
since those ones are rolled and sealed with wax.

name: the Enchanter
longDescription: The Enchanter is here placing a dweomer upon well made sword.
detailedDescription:
The Enchanter is hard at work, concentrating on a spell which could
either destroy the weapon or make it many times more powerful than
it already is.

name: the dancing sword
longDescription: A well crafted sword lies on the work table here.
detailedDescription: It looks quite sharp.

name: the Mad Alchemist
longDescription: The Mad Alchemist babbles something incomprehensible and attacks.
detailedDescription:
He looks like he has been quaffing too many potions.  His eyes dart
around wildly, and he starts to drool.

The Mad Alchemist throws back his head and cackles with insane glee!

name: the Master Summoner
longDescription: The Master Summoner is here holding gateways open to other planes.
detailedDescription:
The Summoner looks to be hard at work, concentrating on keeping control
over the gateway before he loses his soul to the creatures on the other
side of it.

name: the Master Charmer
longDescription: The Master Charmer utters the words, 'uuuzzldctz'.
detailedDescription: The Master Charmer sizes you up, always looking for a new pet.

name: the wooden golem
longDescription: A wooden golem stands a silent vigil here, guarding the stairs.
detailedDescription: He looks flammable.

name: the Master Spellbinder
longDescription: The Master Spellbinder is here re-charging a blackened wand.
detailedDescription: The Master Spellbinder snarls at you and attacks.

name: the Golem Maker
longDescription: The Golem Maker is here chiseling some stone.
detailedDescription:
The Golem Master appears to be very meticulous about his work, to
the point of fussing over it.

name: the granite golem
longDescription: A granite golem stands here waiting to do its master's bidding.
detailedDescription: It looks like a statue, until you see it shamble towards you.

name: the bronze golem
longDescription: A bronze golem stands here shining in the light.
detailedDescription: He looks rather dim witted.

name: the flesh golem
longDescription: A flesh golem stands guard here
detailedDescription:
It looks to be made of a potpourri of different body parts; some don't
even resemble anything human.

name: the cloth golem
longDescription: A cloth golem wanders around here.
detailedDescription: It looks like a bunch of old rags, quite surprising it can actually walk.

name: the adamantite golem
longDescription: An adamantite golem stands here looking very dangerous.
detailedDescription:
It seems to be forged of dark metal.  It looks strong and durable,
but somewhat un-intelligent.

name: the clay golem
longDescription: A clay golem stands guard here.
detailedDescription: This large golem almost looks like it is made of dirt.

name: the Master of Illusions
longDescription: An enormous multi-colored three-headed dragon growls at you.
detailedDescription:
The image of an ugly dragon flickers slightly, and where the dragon
was now stands a small harmless looking old man.

name: the Necromancer
longDescription: The Necromancer is here raising undead servants.
detailedDescription:
Attired all in black, the Necromancer is tall and gangly, but still quite
an imposing figure.  A dark cowl shrouds most of his face, but two blazing
embers which serve as eyes can be seen through the shadow.
The Necromancer shrieks some obscenities and orders his minions to attack.

name: the animated skeleton
longDescription: An animated skeleton screams silently and attacks.
detailedDescription: It feels no pain, and hacks at you ruthlessly.

name: the undead giant
longDescription: An undead giant lumbers towards you.
detailedDescription:
This thing seems to be the reanimated corpse of a giant, creating an
enormous zombie.

name: the ugly witch
longDescription: An ugly witch is here scrying out secrets.
detailedDescription:
She has no face at all, just blank skin, rather disturbing.  From about
where her mouth should be, comes a disgusting giggling sound that makes
your skin crawl with revulsion.

name: the Librarian
longDescription: The Librarian has fallen asleep at his desk here.
detailedDescription: He looks like a rather peaceful old man.

name: the Master's apprentice
longDescription: The Master's apprentice leaps to halt your passage.
detailedDescription:
A powerful wizard in his own right, the apprentice of the master of balance
has given up his station in the mage guild hierarchy in order to serve the
Great Master in hopes of gleaning secrets one could never hope to uncover
alone.

name: the grey cat
longDescription: A grey cat is lounging lazily here.
detailedDescription:
The grey cat cocks an ear towards you, sensing your scrutiny, then purrs
contentedly.  It looks rather harmless, until you notice its very large
claws.

name: the Master of Neutrality
longDescription: The Master of Neutrality is here contemplating the balance of the Universe.
detailedDescription: He looks quite peaceful.

name: the black robed apprentice
longDescription: A black robed apprentice jumps from the shadows and attacks.
detailedDescription:
She bears a wicked looking scar down the side of her face, though once
she must have been beautiful, now the scar combined with what seems to
be a permanent scowl make her looks quite fearsome.

name: the black cat
longDescription: A black cat with its fur up hisses at you.
detailedDescription:
It looks both mean and dangerous.  Petting seems to be completely out of
the question.

name: the Master of the Black Robes
longDescription: The Master of the Black Robes is here plotting vile deeds.
detailedDescription: The Master glares at you.

name: the white robed apprentice
longDescription: A white robed apprentice screams at your desecration of goodness.
detailedDescription:
He looks like a fanatic.
The white robed apprentice screams 'Thou art unworthy of this honour!'

name: the white cat
longDescription: A white cat is here preening its fur.
detailedDescription: It seems to be nothing more than a large ball of fluff with claws.

name: the Master of Goodness
longDescription: The Master of Goodness is here frowning at your intrusion.
detailedDescription: He looks like a self-righteous bastard.

name: the calico cat
longDescription: A large calico cat is lounging about here.
detailedDescription:
It looks incredibly large for a cat, no doubt a giant of its species.
A beautiful jewel encrusted collar about its neck is its only adornment.

name: the Grand Mistress
longDescription: The Grand Mistress of Magic is sitting here.
detailedDescription:
She looks quite comfortable on her emerald throne. Amazingly young and
pretty for one of such stature in the guild, no doubt she has kept her
youthful appearance through the use of strong magics.
The Grand Mistress pets her familiar and smiles at you in confidence.

name: the wizard
longDescription: A wizard walks around behind the counter, talking to himself.
detailedDescription:
The wizard looks old and senile, and yet he looks like a very powerful
wizard.  He is equipped with fine clothing, and is wearing many fine
rings and bracelets.

name: the baker
longDescription: The baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
detailedDescription:
A fat, nice looking baker.  But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.

name: the grocer
longDescription: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.
detailedDescription: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.

name: the weaponsmith
longDescription: A weaponsmith is standing here.
detailedDescription:
He is a young weaponsmith, who still has lots to learn but he is still
eager to sell you his latest implements of carnage and destruction.

name: the armourer
longDescription: An armourer stands here displaying his new (and previously owned) armours.
detailedDescription:
An old but very strong armourer.  He has made more suits of armour in his
life than you have ever seen.

name: the receptionist
longDescription: A receptionist is standing behind the counter here, smiling at you.
detailedDescription:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

name: Captain Stolar
longDescription: A retired captain stands here, selling boats.
detailedDescription: This captain has eaten more sharks than you have killed peas.

name: the sailor
longDescription: A sailor stands here, waiting to help you.
detailedDescription: He looks like a strong, fit sailor.

name: Uncle Juan
longDescription: Uncle Juan is here ready to take your order.
detailedDescription: He looks like he may or may not have a green card.

name: Wally the Watermaster
longDescription: Wally the Watermaster is standing behind the counter.
detailedDescription:
Wally is a bit pudgy but looks very strong.  He has a glass of Midgaard
Natural Spring Water in his hand.  When he notices you, he proudly
displays his fine collection of contemporary waters.

name: the postmaster
longDescription: The head postmaster is standing here, waiting to help you with your mail.
detailedDescription:
The Postmaster seems like a happy old man, though a bit sluggish.  He
worries about the reputation of the MMS (Midgaard Mail Service), as many
people seem to think that it is slow.  Perhaps if he were to brush the
cobwebs from his uniform it would help to make a better impression.

name: the mages' guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster is studying a spellbook while preparing to cast a spell.
detailedDescription:
Even though your guildmaster looks old and tired, you can clearly see the
vast amount of knowledge she possesses.  She is wearing fine magic clothing,
and you notice that she is surrounded by a blue shimmering aura.

name: the priests' guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster is prayer to your God here.
detailedDescription:
You are in no doubt that this guildmaster is truly close to your God; he
has a peaceful, loving look.  You notice that he is surrounded by a white
aura.

name: the thieves' guildmaster
longDescription: A beggar is sitting here, could she be a guildmaster?
detailedDescription:
You realize that whenever your guildmaster moves, you fail to notice it -
the way of the true thief.  She is to be dressed in poor clothing, having
the appearance of a beggar.

name: the fighters' guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster is standing here sharpening an axe.
detailedDescription:
This is your master. Big and strong with bulging muscles. Several scars
across his body proves that he was using arms before you were born. He
has a calm look on his face.

name: the sorcerer
longDescription: A sorcerer is guarding the entrance.
detailedDescription:
He is an experienced mage who has specialized in the field of Combat Magic.
He is here to guard the Mage's Guild and his superior knowledge of offensive
as well as defensive spells make him a deadly opponent.

name: the knight templar
longDescription: A knight templar is guarding the entrance.
detailedDescription:
He is a specially trained warrior belonging to the military order of the
Faith.  His duty is to protect the faithful from persecution and infidel
attacks and his religious devotion combined with his superior skill makes
him a deadly opponent.

name: the assassin
longDescription: An assassin is guarding the entrance.
detailedDescription:
He is a thief who has specialized in killing others as effectively as
possible, using all sorts of weapons.  His superior knowledge of how
and where to use them combined with his extraordinary stealth makes
him a deadly opponent.

name: the knight
longDescription: A knight is guarding the entrance.
detailedDescription:
He is an expert warrior who has attained knighthood through countless
chivalrous deeds.  His duty is to protect the Guild of Swordsmen and his
extreme skill combined with his experience in warfare makes him a deadly
opponent.

name: the bartender
longDescription: A bartender watches you calmly, while he skillfully mixes a drink.
detailedDescription: A tired looking Bartender who hates trouble in his bar.

name: the waiter
longDescription: A waiter is going around from one place to another.
detailedDescription: A tired looking waiter.

name: the waiter
longDescription: A man now leads a quiet, peaceful life as a waiter is standing here.
detailedDescription:
This man was obviously a famous sorcerer in his younger days as you
instantly recognize his face.

name: the waiter
longDescription: A waiter who seems to have reached contact with his God is standing here.
detailedDescription:
This waiter almost makes you feel like you should drop to your knees
and begin to worship your God.  Naaah.

name: the waiter
longDescription: A waiter who knows where all his customers keep their money is standing here.
detailedDescription: Hmmm... wonder where he got that coin he is playing with.

name: the waiter
longDescription: A waiter is here.
detailedDescription:
This guy looks like he could easily kill you while still carrying
quite a few firebreathers.

name: Filthy
longDescription: Filthy is standing here, eager to serve you a special drink.
detailedDescription:
Filthy looks real, ehm, dirty.  He likes to keep his customers happy,
but do not mess with him or else he'll get upset.

name: the Peacekeeper
longDescription: A Peacekeeper is standing here, ready to jump in at the first sign of trouble.
detailedDescription: He looks very strong and wise.  Looks like he doesn't answer to ANYONE.

name: the cityguard
longDescription: A cityguard stands here.
detailedDescription: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: the janitor
longDescription: A janitor is walking around, cleaning up.
detailedDescription: What a tough job he has.

name: the beastly fido
longDescription: A beastly fido is mucking through the garbage looking for food here.
detailedDescription:
The fido is a small dog that has a foul smell and pieces of rotted meat
hanging around his teeth.

name: the mercenary
longDescription: A mercenary is waiting for a job here.
detailedDescription: He looks pretty mean, and you imagine he'd do anything for money.

name: the drunk
longDescription: A singing, happy Drunk.
detailedDescription: A drunk who seems to be too happy, and to carry too much money.

name: the beggar
longDescription: A beggar is here, asking for a few coins.
detailedDescription: The beggar looks like she is fed up with life.

name: the odif yltsaeb
longDescription: An odif yltsaeb is here, walking backwards.
detailedDescription: The odif is a small god that has been reversed by some dog.

name: the cityguard
longDescription: A cityguard is here, guarding the gate.
detailedDescription: A big, strong, helpful, trustworthy guard.

name: the green gelatinous blob
longDescription: An oozing green gelatinous blob is here, sucking in bits of debris.
detailedDescription: A horrid looking thing; it is huge, greenish, and looks like the blob.

name: the Pet Shop Boy
longDescription: There is a Pet Shop Boy standing here cuddleing something furry in his hands.
detailedDescription: As you look at him, he opens his hands to reveal a rat!

name: the kitten
longDescription: A small loyal kitten is here.
detailedDescription: The kitten looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

name: the puppy
longDescription: A small loyal puppy is here.
detailedDescription: The puppy looks like a cute, little, fierce fighter.

name: the beagle
longDescription: A small, quick, loyal beagle is here.
detailedDescription: The beagle looks like a fierce fighter.

name: the rottweiler
longDescription: A large, loyal rottweiler is here.
detailedDescription: The rottweiler looks like a strong, fierce fighter.

name: the wolf
longDescription: A large, trained wolf is here.
detailedDescription: The wolf looks like a strong, fearless fighter.

name: the cryogenicist
longDescription: The cryogenicist is here, playing with a canister of liquid nitrogen.
detailedDescription:
You notice a tired look in her face.  She looks like she isn't paid well
enough to put up with any crap from mud players with attitudes.

name: the Maid
longDescription: The Maid is waiting for your order.
detailedDescription:
She is very beautiful with golden hair, and deep blue eyes.  A good reason
for coming here more often, you think to yourself.

name: the Sexton
longDescription: A Sexton is sitting here, drinking hot tea.
detailedDescription: The Sexton looks like he is relaxing after another gravedigging job.

name: the Chief Guard
longDescription: The Chief Guard is looking very upset.
detailedDescription: A very angry chief.

name: the upset cityguard
longDescription: A cityguard stands here, looking very upset.
detailedDescription: A big, strong, angry guard.

name: the Secretary
longDescription: A secretary is sitting at the desk, typing away on the typewriter.
detailedDescription:
She looks very busy.

The Secretary says 'Sorry, but the Mayor is extremely busy today.'
The Secretary says 'Please sit down and have a seat in the meantime.'

name: the Mayor
longDescription: The Mayor is sitting in his huge chair, snoring loudly.
detailedDescription: He is a stocky, middle-aged man with thin, grey hair.

name: the Town Crier
longDescription: The Town Crier is here, weeping quietly.
detailedDescription: He is very good at his job - completely dissolved in tears.

name: the swan
longDescription: A swan is swimming around in the pond.
detailedDescription: The white swan is very elegant.

name: the duckling
longDescription: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
detailedDescription: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

name: the sparrow
longDescription: A sparrow is flapping around on the ground.
detailedDescription: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

name: the duck
longDescription: A duck is here, quacking happily.
detailedDescription: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.

name: the farmer
longDescription: A farmer walks around, looking for something to do.
detailedDescription:
This farmer is a resident of Stanneg by the Mountains,
and as such, is one of the most boring people on earth.

name: the storekeeper
longDescription: A bored storekeeper waits for you to do something.
detailedDescription:
The bored storekeeper keeps a lazy eye on you as he
waits for you to buy something.  Whee.

name: the cowgirl
longDescription: A cowgirl stand here ready to defend her horses...
detailedDescription:
This woman seems ready for anything you might do...
she is truly a woman to be reckoned with...

name: the horse
longDescription: A horse does horsely things here.
detailedDescription:
This horse looks like a nice horse.  It looks at you
with soft brown eyes and you want to give it a carrot.

name: the farmer's wife
longDescription: A farmer's wife offers you some vegetables.
detailedDescription:
This woman has many different types of fruits and
vegetables for you to buy.  She looks bored, though.

name: Aglandiir
longDescription: The Dragon Prince, Aglandiir, sits here looking at you curiously.
detailedDescription:
Aglandiir is a prince of his kind, and he didn't get where
he is today by letting people steal from his horde!

name: the Cyclops
longDescription: A Cyclops is here, trying to judge range with no depth perception.
detailedDescription:
This Cyclops throws rocks real good.  With one eye though,
hitting the target is another matter.  He looks at you and
growls as he misses again!

name: Salle
longDescription: A woman ignores you completely, so intent is she upon her sword.
detailedDescription:
She is a stunning woman, all hair and eyes, it seems.
Her clothing is of the same tawny brown of her skin and
hair.  Her blue eyes look at you appraisingly, seemingly
to show great intelligence.  Her mouth twitches into a
sneer...

name: Duwick
longDescription: A truly immense man laughs at you, and draws his knife!
detailedDescription:
This has to be one of the biggest men you've ever seen.  He is
a full seven feet toe to head, and weighs a good three hundred
pounds -- mostly on his biceps and pectorals it appears.  An
ornate scabbard slaps by his side, with the pommel of a silvered
dagger sticking out... a tiny weapon for such a large man!

name: the Receptionist
longDescription: A receptionist offers you a room.
detailedDescription:
He looks like a retired farmer now making an honest living in an inn.
More power to him!

name: the innkeeper
longDescription: An aged innkeeper greets you as you enter.
detailedDescription:
He is old and greying, but seems to have been able to
keep his mental faculties through the years.  A large
woolen sweater is wrapped about him for warmth.  His
blue eyes dance with amusement as he notices your weapons,
but he doesn't seem too terribly startled.

name: the hunter
longDescription: A hunter walks through the town streets on his own time.
detailedDescription:
He looks mean, as if the very personality of the mountains
had infected him with hardness.  His stride is purposeful,
his face weathered, his eyes cold and dark.  Others are
standing out of his way as he walks on by.

name: a waiter
longDescription: A waiter rushes by, intent on his business.
detailedDescription:
He looks harried from the way he hastily takes orders and
rushes in the back to get food, and to the bar for drinks.
He doesn't even spare you a glance as he passes by.

name: a waitress
longDescription: A waitress rushes by, intent on her business.
detailedDescription:
She looks harried from the way she hastily takes orders and rushes
in the back to get food, and to the bar for drinks.  She doesn't
even spare you a glance as she passes by.

name: a bartender
longDescription: A bartender washes a glass idly here.
detailedDescription:
He nods, smiles, and asks you what you would like to drink.
As you decide, he slowly polishes a glass with an old bar
rag.  The glass is completely clean, but he polishes it anyway.
Go figure.

name: the bandit
longDescription: A bandit springs into action upon seeing you.
detailedDescription:
Whew!  Has this guy ever seen a bath?  His face, hands, arms...
nearly every bit of him is covered with grime, dust, dirt and
decay.  His sword is polished and cleaned though...

name: the bandit guard
longDescription: A bandit guard stands at attention here.
detailedDescription:
He may be a bandit, but he's no slacker.  You wonder
who would be able to keep these bandits in line enough
to pull a good guard duty...

(boy is this guy DIRTY!!!)

name: the slave
longDescription: A slave here is mining out a new passageway.
detailedDescription:
The slave looks up at you with pleading eyes.  He
wants his freedom.  The chains around his ankles are
tight, and you wonder if you should set him free, and
if you even can.

name: the farmer
longDescription: A farmer walks around, looking for something to do.
detailedDescription:
This farmer is a resident of Stanneg by the Mountains,
and as such, is one of the most boring people on earth.

name: the hunter
longDescription: A hunter walks through the town streets on his own time.
detailedDescription:
He looks mean, as if the very personality of the mountains
had infected him with hardness.  His stride is purposeful,
his face weathered, his eyes cold and dark.  Others are
standing out of his way as he walks on by.

name: the wyvern
longDescription: A monstrous wyvern slowly circles just above your head.
detailedDescription:
This huge winged creature looks really menacing as it circles only inches
above your head, flapping its wings and squawking very loudly.

name: the goblin
longDescription: A mountain goblin is wandering around mumbling to himself...
detailedDescription:
You see before you a small and twisted creature with knotted muscles and
disgustingly green skin.  Doesn't look like the type you'd invite to dinner.

name: the goblin lieutenant
longDescription: A goblin lieutenant stands here, attempting to get his men in order.
detailedDescription:
The goblin lieutenant is rather angry, and looking for one of his men to
beat up upon, but maybe you will do just fine...

name: the goblin leader
longDescription: The goblin leader surveys the room.
detailedDescription:
The leader doesn't look too happy that you have found him here.  He grabs
for his shortsword and lunges for your neck.

name: the small boy
longDescription: A small boy sits here, licking his wounds.
detailedDescription:
The poor boy has numerous cuts and scratches, but appears to be all right.
He is apparently the only survivor of the ambush.

name: the Innkeeper
longDescription: The Innkeeper stands here, cleaning glasses.
detailedDescription:
The Innkeeper now spends most of his days waiting for customers, while the
nights are spent watching out for goblins.  His inn is no longer the happy
place that is used to be in days past.

name: the bard
longDescription: A sullen bard is here, drinking away his problems.
detailedDescription:
You can smell the alcohol on his breath from across the room.  This poor
bard has been sitting here quite a while, drinking himself into oblivion.

name: the dark horseman
longDescription: A dark horseman is here, mounted on his black steed.
detailedDescription:
The man is obviously an outlaw, and has no qualms about slashing you into
little bits.

name: the Pawn of the Black Court
longDescription: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
detailedDescription:
The Black Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed.
His armor is shiny and black.  He stands ready to give his life for the
Crown.

name: the Pawn of the White Court
longDescription: You see a pawn standing here waiting for orders.
detailedDescription:
The White Pawn looks quite like a small knight without his powerful steed.
His armor is spotless and white.  He stands ready to give his life for the
Crown.

name: the Black Rook
longDescription: In the corner you see a large, black, stone castle on wheels.
detailedDescription:
The Black Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just
from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

name: the White Rook
longDescription: In the corner you see a large, white, stone castle on wheels.
detailedDescription:
The White Rook is a very large man-made tomb on wheels.  Just
from the looks of it, it will probably be YOUR tomb.

name: the Black Knight
longDescription: Here stands a magnificent knight of the dark realm.
detailedDescription:
The Black Knight is here, riding his ebony black war horse.  His eyes
flash behind his visor in vengence.

name: the White Knight
longDescription: Here stands a magnificent knight of the light realm.
detailedDescription:
The White Knight is here, riding his ivory white war horse.  His eyes
gleam behind his visor in joy.

name: the Black Bishop
longDescription: A dark priest stands here.
detailedDescription:
The Black Bishop seems willing to help you straight into your grave so
he can bless you properly.

name: the White Bishop
longDescription: A light priest stands here.
detailedDescription:
The White Bishop seems willing to help you in any possible so that he can
attain a higher spirituality.

name: the Black Queen
longDescription: The Black Queen stands here.
detailedDescription:
The Black Queen is a strikingly beautiful woman with pale skin and a
mass of dark hair that crowns her head like a black cloud.  If looks
could kill, you would already be dead.

name: the White Queen
longDescription: The White Queen stands here.
detailedDescription:
The White Queen is a stunningly beautiful woman with dark skin and a mass
of light hair that frames her head like the sun.  This is surely love at
first sight for you.

name: the Black King
longDescription: The Black King stands here.
detailedDescription:
The Black King is a menacing figure.  You can easily understand why he
is the king and you are not.

name: the White King
longDescription: The White King stands here.
detailedDescription:
The White King is a stately figure.  You can easily understand why he
is the king and you are not.

name: the snake
longDescription: A large dreadful snake is at your feet, hissing at you.
detailedDescription: It looks hungry.

name: the green snake
longDescription: A small green snake is here, and it doesn't look too friendly...
detailedDescription: It looks harmless.

name: the centipede
longDescription: A small centipede is here, making its way across the floor.
detailedDescription: It looks completely harmless.

name: the kobold
longDescription: An ugly kobold is here, searching for dinner.
detailedDescription: It looks ugly.

name: the orc
longDescription: The orc walks around, looking for someone to kill.
detailedDescription: You notice an evil look in its eyes...

name: the orc
longDescription: A large orc is here, looking really mean.
detailedDescription: He looks dreadful.

name: the warrior
longDescription: A tall warrior is here.  He has more scars than anyone you have ever seen.
detailedDescription: He seems to be a strong, brainless fighter.

name: the warrior
longDescription: A tall warrior is here.
detailedDescription: He seems to know his way with weapons.

name: the hobgoblin
longDescription: A small hobgoblin stands here.
detailedDescription: The hobgoblin looks quite lost.

name: the snake
longDescription: A brown snake watches you.
detailedDescription: The snake looks quite mean.

name: the centipede
longDescription: A white centipede is here.
detailedDescription: The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you.

name: the hobgoblin
longDescription: A large hobgoblin is here.
detailedDescription: The hobgoblin looks quite dangerous.

name: the orc
longDescription: An orc is here, looking for something (or perhaps someone?) to eat.
detailedDescription: Well, he doesn't seem to be friendly.

name: the mountain lion
longDescription: A mountain lion is here, growling at you viciously.
detailedDescription: The lion looks very nasty with huge claws and big teeth.

name: the hill giant
longDescription: A hill giant is here, tossing some rocks around.
detailedDescription:
The hill giant looks like he's about 9 feet tall.  By his actions you
quickly come to the conclusion that he isn't very intelligent.

name: the mage
longDescription: A small intelligent looking mage is standing here.
detailedDescription:
His IQ makes almost any normal person look stupid...
It looks like he knows his way with magic.

name: the troll
longDescription: A large mean-looking troll is here.
detailedDescription: Well, it looks dangerous!

name: the snake
longDescription: A large green snake is here, looks like a guardian for an evil force.
detailedDescription: You see a evil creature.

name: the thief
longDescription: A thief is here, all dressed in black.
detailedDescription:
He seems to be counting a handful of coins.  Maybe you ought to count YOUR
gold too...

name: the orc
longDescription: A ugly orc is standing here.
detailedDescription: It is quite disgusting to look at.

name: the centipede
longDescription: A small harmless centipede is here.
detailedDescription: Well it doesn't seem to pay any attention to you.

name: the warrior
longDescription: A human warrior is here.  He has a evil grin in his face.
detailedDescription: He doesn't look friendly at all...

name: the kobold
longDescription: A green kobold is here.
detailedDescription: It looks slimy..

name: the dervish
longDescription: A raggity dervish walks on aimlessly.
detailedDescription: Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use some rest.

name: the dervish
longDescription: A large dervish watches for signs of trouble.
detailedDescription:
Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use LOTS of
rest.

name: the coral snake
longDescription: A brightly colored snake slithers along the sands.
detailedDescription:
This relatively harmless snake has bright alternating bands of red, yellow
and black.

name: the small scorpion
longDescription: A small, red scorpion scuttles away at your approach.
detailedDescription: The little tail is mighty dangerous for such a small creature.

name: the sand worm
longDescription: A giant, purple sand worm thrusts up out of the sand and attacks!
detailedDescription: He's big, mean, and purple.  Watch out!

name: the brass dragon
longDescription: A very large brass dragon steps out of the darkness and says 'Hello.'
detailedDescription: Then adds to it, 'Prepare to die, have a nice day!'

name: the nomad leader
longDescription: The nomad leader sits silently in prayer.
detailedDescription:
He is clad in silk robes lined with gold thread. At his side is a large,
engraved cutlass.  He has an especially haughty air about him.

name: the nomad commander
longDescription: The nomad commander stands here staring at you suspiciously.
detailedDescription:
This is the nomad leader's second in command.  His clothes are richly woven
of silk and gold thread.  A nasty cutlass hangs at his side.

name: the nomad warrior
longDescription: A proud nomad warrior stands here.
detailedDescription: This warrior is dressed in typical nomad clothing and looks quite mean.

name: the slave
longDescription: A young slave sits here staring at you with pleading eyes.
detailedDescription: She looks quite thin and weak.

name: the dracolich
longDescription: A pile of bones rises up to form a skeletal dracolich.
detailedDescription:
The dracolich is now only bone with pieces of flesh hanging from it.
Obviously it no longer fears death.

name: the drider
longDescription: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
detailedDescription: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

name: the dark dwarf
longDescription: A duergar is here mining precious stones with his pick.
detailedDescription:
The duergar could probably crush your head as easily as he does those
rocks.

name: the myconoid
longDescription: A myconoid lumbers along peacefully.
detailedDescription:
The myconoid looks something like a giant mushroom (and probably has the
same effect).

name: the myconoid shaman
longDescription: A rather large myconoid stands here chanting in a strange tongue.
detailedDescription: The shaman shoots spores into the air.

name: the dustdigger
longDescription: A small oasis invites you to dive in.
detailedDescription:
Looking a little closer at this oasis, you begin to wonder why
it seems to be moving about...

name: the camel
longDescription: A very dangerous creature, a camel, snorts at you.
detailedDescription:
It is advisable not to mess with this creature.  After all, you
have heard many a horror story about experiences with camels.
Bad experiences.

name: the goblin slave
longDescription: A goblin slave lies here asleep.
detailedDescription: The defenseless goblin begs for mercy.

name: the Drow commoner
longDescription: A drow commoner is here, walking around on guard duty.
detailedDescription: I doubt he is the type to give directions.

name: the drow warrior
longDescription: A drow warrior stands here guarding his home.
detailedDescription: He looks kind of annoyed!

name: the drow mage
longDescription: A drow mage is here protecting his home.
detailedDescription: The mage prepares to cast a spell... at you!!

name: the drow priestess
longDescription: A drow priestess is here shouting orders.
detailedDescription: I wouldn't want go get on her bad side!

name: the drow master
longDescription: A drow master stares at you angrily.
detailedDescription: The drow master is ALWAYS ready for a fight.

name: the weaponsmaster
longDescription: A drow weaponsmaster is here shadow boxing.
detailedDescription: He definitely know his way around in combat.

name: the Matron Mother
longDescription: The Matron Mother of the house is standing here.
detailedDescription: She looks really and truly annoyed that you have found your way here.

name: the Matron Mother
longDescription: The Matron Mother of the first house is waiting for you.
detailedDescription: She looks like she is about to rip your head of and eat it.

name: the drider
longDescription: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
detailedDescription: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

name: the drider
longDescription: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
detailedDescription: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

name: the yochlol
longDescription: A yochlol forms out of a swirling mist...
detailedDescription: The yochlol is not in a good mood.

name: the mighty beholder
longDescription: You meet a beholder's deadly gaze!
detailedDescription:
It has a large central eye that projects an anti-magic ray and ten
eyestalks atop the round body which can do anything from charm you
to disintegrate you.  Beholders are not known for their personality.

name: the lamia
longDescription: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
detailedDescription:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower
body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

name: the mimic
longDescription: A strong chest lies in one corner of the room.
detailedDescription:
A strong, wooden chest bound with iron straps and a heavy padlock on the
front.

name: the mimic
longDescription: Two skeletons lie crushed under a large boulder.
detailedDescription:
This large boulder seems to have been dropped here at some point, since
there aren't any boulders native to this area.  The two skeletons beneath
it are simply that, bones... no rags or anything else appears to be
attached to them.

name: the mimic
longDescription: The stone floor of this house has been ripped apart.
detailedDescription:
What a mess, you wonder to yourself what could have caused this rampant
destruction.

name: the mimic
longDescription: Some broken shards of pottery lie strewn about the floor.
detailedDescription:
The pottery shards appear to have been part of a large vase at one point,
probably before the city fell.

name: the mimic
longDescription: A few wooden planks lie stacked on a low shelf.
detailedDescription:
The fact that these planks still rest on this shelf leads you to believe
that someone has been here before you...

name: the horned lizard
longDescription: A small horned lizard flicks his tongue and slithers away.
detailedDescription: A cute little lizard -- that is, if you like reptiles!

name: the stone golem
longDescription: In the corner you see a large, stone golem faithfully standing watch.
detailedDescription:
It is a big chunk of rock that has been magically formed into a giant stone
creature.  He stands here still guarding the city.

name: the lamia
longDescription: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
detailedDescription:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the lower
body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at you greedily.

name: the horrible asp
longDescription: A small, poisonous asp slithers over your feet.
detailedDescription:
The asp is a small, smooth-scaled snake the color of worn pottery.
The poison bite of this snake has felled many a mighty pharoah.

name: the hooded cobra snake
longDescription: A cobra snake rears up and opens its fearsome hood.
detailedDescription:
The cobra snake waves back and forth before you, its hood displaying brilliant
colors designed to serve notice to its prey that it is about to strike.

name: the wily little mongoose
longDescription: A small mongoose slinks along the ground, hunting snakes.
detailedDescription:
The mongoose is a wily rodent, a quick hunter of nasty poisonous snakes.
She sniffs you and appears to be looking for food in your hand.

name: the pyramid watcher
longDescription: The pyramid watcher protects the tombs from intruders.
detailedDescription:
The pyramid watcher has made a pledge to destroy any would-be looters of
the tombs of the pharoahs.  He is clad from head to foot in utilitarian
sand-colored clothing.

name: the tomb thief
longDescription: A sneaky tomb thief moves about in search of treasure.
detailedDescription: The thief brushes against you briefly, then slinks back into the shadows.

name: Ali Baba
longDescription: Ali Baba is here, hunting for the pharoah's tomb.
detailedDescription:
You see a tall, full-bearded man with a mischevious glint in his eye.  Ali Baba
has made his life from stealing things from others, including many items stolen
recently from under the nose of the hapless guardians of this pyramid.  Someday
he might get caught, but not today...

name: the magic carpet
longDescription: A small woven carpet lies under your feet.
detailedDescription:
The carpet is simply beautiful, made from intricately woven silken material.
It seems to rise up at the touch of your feet.  Wait, it is rising, a few feet
above the ground!  In fact, it seems to be ALIVE!

name: the mummy
longDescription: A mummy reaches for you, disturbed by your presence.
detailedDescription:
You only see the disfigured, rotting features of decaying human flesh,
animated by the distempered spirit of a long-deceased person.

name: the sandman
longDescription: A sandman rises up from the desert floor.
detailedDescription:
The sandman is exactly that -- some sort of strange being formed from the sands
of the desert floor.  It seems quite large and strong and at home in the heat
and sandy winds.

name: the efreeti
longDescription: The efreeti stands here, sheathed in a column of fire.
detailedDescription:
The efreeti is a mighty being formed from living fire.  He gazes down at
you with disdain and scorn, arms folded across his mighty chest.

name: the caryatid
longDescription: A sandstone column stands here, carved into a feminine figure.
detailedDescription:
The column has been carved into a set of four shapely women, each facing
outward into the room.  The sandstone of the caryatid is smooth with age,
but you can still make out a deadly stone sword in the hands of each figure.

name: the djinn
longDescription: The djinn issues forth from the confines of a small lamp.
detailedDescription:
The djinn is a mighty being formed from the air itself and frequently
imprisoned in a small lamp, used to do the bidding of those who find him.
He smiles down at you congenially, arms folded across his blue-tinged
skin, and strokes his goatee.

name: the hieracosphinx
longDescription: A hieracosphinx looks at you cunningly.
detailedDescription:
The hieracosphinx are cunning, small, but nasty creatures, having the heads
of birds, mighty wingspans, and a full set of four paws to rend their victims
to pieces.  They tend to be quite jealous of the sharper wits of their older
cousins.

name: the gynosphinx
longDescription: A gynosphinx sits here, befuddled by a riddle.
detailedDescription:
The gynosphinx is a crafty but gentle creature, having the body of a
beautiful dark-skinned woman from the waist up, a feathery set of wings
and the hind legs of a mighty cat.  Right now she is confused, having
just heard a puzzling riddle from a cousin criosphinx.

name: the criosphinx
longDescription: A criosphinx calmly watches you.
detailedDescription:
The criosphinx is a calm and friendly creature, having the head of a ram atop
the body of a well-furred feline with eagle-like wings.  He delights in riddles,
and in poking occasional fun at his easily confused lesser cousins.

name: the androsphinx
longDescription: A mighty androsphinx tosses its lion-like mane.
detailedDescription:
The mighty androsphinx is a huge creature, with the body of a lion whose
face  is quite man-like, perhaps even handsome, and a massive pair of feathered
wings.  Tales are told of pharoahs that were rendered permanently deaf by the
mighty roar of this sphinx.

name: the great sphinx
longDescription: A mighty sphinx rests here in the sand, dormant now for centuries.
detailedDescription:
The great sphinx towers tens of feet above you, resting here in a state of
dormancy.  It has become almost indistinguishable from the sand that surrounds
it, although you can still make out the features of the handsome face that once
advised many rulers.

name: Ramses the Damned
longDescription: You have awakened the mighty servant to the pharoahs, Ramses.
detailedDescription:
As your light spills over his face and body, you can see his features
begin to fill out, swell, and harden, until an apparently healthy man
stands before you, clad only in the raiments he was left in when he last
slept.  His hair is a soft black, his skin a deep chocolate, and his
tall frame is totally still, his chest not even moving to breathe.

name: the guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
detailedDescription: An old man peering through ancient tomes rests here.

name: the guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
detailedDescription: An older man wrapped in purple, long-flowing robes meditates here.

name: the guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
detailedDescription: A smaller man dressed in black robes stands here waiting to train you.

name: the guildmaster
longDescription: Your guildmaster stands here.
detailedDescription:
A small human dressed in black rests in the corner.  As you enter he grabs
a knife and throws it at you.  It lands in the wall next to your left ear.
'We will now begin', is all he says.

name: the receptionist
longDescription: A dark skinned, veiled woman greets you from behind the desk.
detailedDescription:
This Arabian beauty is obviously the daughter of some high ranking
official.  As you attempt to sneak a peek under her veil you notice
a small moon-shaped birthmark on her left cheek.

name: the old withered man
longDescription: An old withered man leans against the bar.
detailedDescription: He looks distracted as he pours five drinks at once without error.

name: Brother John
longDescription: Brother John, lead singer for the Lokettes stands on stage.
detailedDescription:
You see the lead singer of the Lokettes lip synching to an old Zochan
tune.

name: the panhandler
longDescription: A panhandler rests here.
detailedDescription: A small skinny man rests here hoping to find a warm heart.

name: the panhandler
longDescription: A panhandler rests here.
detailedDescription: A small skinny man rests here staring at your clothes.

name: the beggar
longDescription: A grubby beggar sits here in the filth.
detailedDescription: This poor soul seems down on his luck, perhaps you might spare a dime?

name: the baker
longDescription: The baker stands here playing solitaire.
detailedDescription: You see a large man in a white apron covered in flour from head to toe.

name: the shopkeeper
longDescription: The shopkeeper stands here.
detailedDescription: You see a half-elf sitting on a stool behind his counter.

name: the banker
longDescription: A banker stands here waiting to help you.
detailedDescription: This small halfling seems adept at counting money.

name: Ahkeem the tailor
longDescription: Ahkeem the tailor welcomes you to his store.
detailedDescription:
This middle-aged man looks over you with disdain and quickly suggests a
new wardrobe.

name: Vera the veggie lady
longDescription: Vera the veggie lady beems as you look over her stand.
detailedDescription: A tall slender woman stands before you smiling broadly.

name: Butch the meatcutter
longDescription: Butch the meatcutter stands here in his bloodied apron.
detailedDescription:
This stocky dwarf has a mad glint in his eye as he twirls his clever
carelessly into the air.

name: Abdul the armorer
longDescription: Abdul stands here, waiting to help you.
detailedDescription:
Abdul returns your gaze with a steady eye.  You quickly glance away
under his cold stare and place your order.

name: Igor the weaponsmith
longDescription: Igor stands here doing... something.
detailedDescription: You see a small dwarf with a large hump on his left shoulder.

name: Cassandra
longDescription: Cassandra stands proudly over her selection.
detailedDescription:
You see a happy weather-worn face whose lines suggest many years on
the open sea.  It is only through years of fishing that she is able
to withstand the smell that permeates the air.

name: the foreman
longDescription: The foreman stands here screaming at the workers.
detailedDescription:
A worried working dwarf stands here constantly making notes in his
book and looking at his watch.

name: the construction worker
longDescription: A construction worker steadily works here.
detailedDescription: A large sweaty looking man doesn't even return your glance.

name: the statue of Brahman
longDescription: The statue of Brahman stands here.
detailedDescription:
The statue made of solid marble depicts the mighty God defeating Siva
in magical combat.

name: the statue of Siva
longDescription: The statue of Siva stands here.
detailedDescription:
The statue of the High Lord of Destruction stands here beings attacked
by Brahman in magical combat.

name: the statue of Indra
longDescription: The statue of Indra stands here.
detailedDescription: This statue looks like an enormous elephant.

name: the statue of Yama
longDescription: The statue of Yama stands here.
detailedDescription: This is a statue of the God of Death.  It is covered with odd runes.

name: the statue of Surya
longDescription: The statue of Surya stands here.
detailedDescription:
The statue of Surya, the God in charge of the Sun, almost glows
with a firey aura.

name: the statue of Kali
longDescription: The statue of Kali stands here.
detailedDescription:
The statue of the Black Mother, Kali, is made of black marble and
is covered with silver runes.

name: the statue of Brihaspati
longDescription: The statue of Brihaspati stands here.
detailedDescription:
The statue of Brihaspati, the God of Scholars and Knowledge is made
of a weathered marble.

name: The statue of Puchan
longDescription: The statue of Puchan stands here.
detailedDescription:
The statue of Puchan, God of Travellers, is covered with dust and worn
as if it had been dragged a long way down a dusty road.

name: Aziz
longDescription: Aziz the Human Canon stands here.
detailedDescription: This big and burly man grins at you as he draws his sword.

name: Mustafah
longDescription: Mustafah the Human Robber stands here.
detailedDescription: This man is lithe and has an evil smirk upon his face.

name: Fatima
longDescription: Fatima the Elven Invoker stands here.
detailedDescription:
This female elf has dusky skin and black hair.  A combination you don't
see very often on elves.

name: Kareem
longDescription: Kareem the Dwarven Mercenary stands here.
detailedDescription: This short stocky fellow has a chest the girth of a barrel.

name: the nomad merchant
longDescription: A nomad merchant looks you over.
detailedDescription:
This robust fellow returns your gaze with a smile, but something inside
tells you not to trust him very far.

name: the Sultan's Bodyguard
longDescription: A bodyguard sizes you up.
detailedDescription: The large half-orc quickly glances you over and returns to his duties.

name: the skinny kid
longDescription: A skinny kid wanders around.
detailedDescription: This small child sees you looking at him and quickly looks away.

name: the dockworker
longDescription: A strong dockworker walks by moving crates.
detailedDescription:
Although seemingly dull witted, this hulking mass carries the huge
crates from the boats like it was a box of lilies.

name: the taxcollector
longDescription: A small man walks around scribbling in a notebook.
detailedDescription:
The city's taxcollextor walks from store to store collecting the
Sultan's fee for living in his grand city.

name: Gord
longDescription: Gord the Rogue stand here.

name: Chulainn
longDescription: Chulainn the Knight stands here.
detailedDescription:
This large man does not seem to be surprised at your approach and
looks at you quizically.

name: Daghdha
longDescription: Daghdha the Arch-Magi stands here.
detailedDescription: This man is dressed in long brown robes and has a penetrating gaze.

name: Curley GreenLeaf
longDescription: Curley GreenLeaf stands here.

name: the wandering prophet
longDescription: A small grey-haired man walks around spouting gospel.
detailedDescription:
This sad case may have been an evangelist in another lifetime. He is known
to stand on corners and accost passers-by with his doomsday preaching.

name: the alley cat
longDescription: A small harmless feline searches for food.
detailedDescription: You see a small starved cat.

name: the vulture
longDescription: A vulture circles above you.
detailedDescription: As you look up at this bird, you see the only thing it wants is a corpse.

name: the old man
longDescription: An old man sits here playing chess.
detailedDescription: He seems intent on winning.

name: Lugh the Librarian
longDescription: Lugh the Librarian sits behind a desk.
detailedDescription: The huge hulking mass rises as someone asks him a question.

name: the dirt devil
longDescription: The wind kicks up some dust.
detailedDescription: What you see before you is really a baby air elemental.

name: the lamia
longDescription: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
detailedDescription:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the
lower body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at
you greedily.

name: the raggety dervish
longDescription: A raggety dervish stands here.
detailedDescription: This man looks like he could use a lot of rest.

name: the Sultan
longDescription: The Sultan rests here on his throne.
detailedDescription: You see a large wealthy man in red robes smiling at you.

name: a harem girl
longDescription: A lovely, veiled harem girl stands here.
detailedDescription:
You see a dark skinned beauty, wearing almost transparent silks and
light blue veil.  Her loyalty to the Sultan is unwavering.

name: the jailer
longDescription: The Jailer sleeps here, snoring loudly.
detailedDescription:
You see a pathetic soul lying here.  Probably some ex-nobleman that has
fallen out of grace with the Sultan.

name: a eunich
longDescription: A eunich stands here watching over the girls.
detailedDescription:
You see a large man whose only duty is to protect the harem.  He has been
castrated for the ladies' safety.

name: Nichole, the Sultan's favorite
longDescription: Nichole, the Sultan's favorite girl rests on a mound of pillows.
detailedDescription:
You see the most beautiful Arabian girl that has ever meet your eyes.
Too bad she is about to kill you.

name: Allah
longDescription: Allah is here.
detailedDescription: You see the all-knowing Allah.

name: the guildguard
longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of Mages stand here.
detailedDescription: This man looks like a mage/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.

name: the guildguard
longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of Clerics stands here.
detailedDescription: This man looks like a cleric/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.

name: the guildguard
longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of Warriors stands here.
detailedDescription: The man looks like Conan's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him.

name: the guildguard
longDescription: The Guard for the Guild of theives stands here.
detailedDescription:
You see a thief dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you
enter and steps to bar your way.  You notice his hands resting
on two sheathes.

name: the servant boy
longDescription: A servant boy is here running errands.
detailedDescription: You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace.

name: the Sultan's Guard
longDescription: A guard stands here, protecting the innocent.
detailedDescription: You see a trained fighter, ready to help those in need.

name: the Sultan's Guard
longDescription: A guard stands here, watching the gate.
detailedDescription: You see a trained fighter, ready to defend the city.

name: the Chief Guard
longDescription: The Chief of the Sultan's Guard stands here.
detailedDescription: You see a large man skilled in hunting and killing.

name: the mercenary
longDescription: A mercenary stands here waiting for a job.
detailedDescription: You see an assassin down on his luck looking to be freelanced out.

name: the shipwright
longDescription: An old captain rests here carving on a stick.
detailedDescription:
You see the shipwright of New Thalos, waiting to make someone a boat.  He
beams a smile at you through his beard as you walk in.

name: the blacksmith
longDescription: The blacksmith stands here pumping air into his fire.
detailedDescription:
You see a large human, dripping in sweat, standing before you.  He takes
a break from his swealtering work to bid you welcome.

name: the horse
longDescription: A horse stands here.
detailedDescription: You see one of the fine Arabian beasts known about the land.

name: the tourist
longDescription: A tourist stands here looking lost.
detailedDescription:
You see a small, rotund man, with a strange object around his neck and
a nose guard.  He is looking at a small map that he seems to be holding
upside down.

name: the ixitxachitl
longDescription: A very large ray with a wicked looking tail swims here.
detailedDescription: You see a large ray with sharp fangs and a barbed tail.

name: the cryohydra
longDescription: The cryohydra stands here.
detailedDescription: A grey-brown reptillian creature with amber eyes stands before you.

name: the minotaur lizard
longDescription: the minotaur lizard stands here.
detailedDescription: A huge lizard like reptile with horns like a minotaur.

name: the death dog
longDescription: The death dog stands here.
detailedDescription: A large two-headed hound barks at you vicously.

name: the spotted lion
longDescription: The spotted lion stands here.
detailedDescription: A large fierce dapple skinned lion glares at you.

name: the behir
longDescription: A behir slithers on the ground.
detailedDescription: You see a large snake-like reptile with more than a dozen legs.

name: the chimera
longDescription: A creature with three heads: lion, goat, and dragon stands here.
detailedDescription:
The chimera is still a mystery, better left unexplored.  This creature
has the hindquarters of a goat, the forepaws of a lion and the body of
a red dragon.

name: the couatl
longDescription: A couatl hovers here.
detailedDescription:
A beautiful creature with the body of a serpent and feathered wings the
colour of the rainbow.

name: the giant hornet
longDescription: The giant hornet hovers here.
detailedDescription: It is a hornet, what else can be said?

name: the pegasus
longDescription: The pegasus stands here, flexing its wings.
detailedDescription:
A magnificant winged steed, this horse looks much like the Arabian
thoroughbreds you have seen in stables.

name: Elriva
longDescription: Elriva stands here mixing a love potion.
detailedDescription:
You see a very healthy female dressed in black, with long flowing
hair to match her outfit.

name: Braheem
longDescription: Braheem stands here talking to the walls.
detailedDescription: You see a powerful but slighty insane mage.

name: the high priest
longDescription: The high priest rests here meditating, well he WAS meditating.
detailedDescription: He does NOT look real happy that you have disturbed him.

name: the Royal Guard
longDescription: An Elite Royal Guard stands here smiling happily.
detailedDescription:
You see one of the Royal Guards of New Thalos who seems to have undergone
some heavy training.

name: Patch the bartender
longDescription: A large half-orc with a patch over one eye pours beer behind the counter.
detailedDescription:
You see a really big guy here who seems to have lost an eye in one manner
or another.

name: Stitch, the leather dude
longDescription: Stitch, the leather dude reclines in his chair.
detailedDescription:
You see a small hobbit with his feet kicked up on his desk waiting for
some sucker, uhm, customer to walk in his store.

name: the gardener
longDescription: A small elf stands here tending the garden.
detailedDescription:
A young elf stands here in dirt covered overalls.  He seems to be
weeding his garden.

name: the nightmare
longDescription: A large horse, black as night, stands here.
detailedDescription:
You see the largest horse you have ever seen before.  Standing 10'
at the shoulder it breathes flame from his nostrils and leaps to
attack you.

name: the wolverine
longDescription: A large wolf like creature leaps out from the darkness.
detailedDescription:
You see a half wolf, half human beast wearing a glove with long thin
blades on it.

name: the mimic
longDescription: You see an incredibly life-like painting of the Sultan's mother.
detailedDescription: Boy is she ugly.

name: the mayor
longDescription: The Mayor of New Thalos stands here.
detailedDescription: You see a chubby rabbit dressed in his best suit.

name: the chef
longDescription: The chef stands here making dinner.
detailedDescription: You see a very large human who seems to taste everything he makes.

name: John the Lumberjack
longDescription: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.
detailedDescription:
He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy,
chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is
one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.

name: the rabbit
longDescription: A small rabbit is foraging in the bushes here.
detailedDescription: It is a small, furry creature with long ears and big feet.

name: the brown bear
longDescription: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
detailedDescription:
The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp
teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little dolls from toy shops at all.

name: the ferocious rabbit
longDescription: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
detailedDescription:
This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked
