by the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and
innocent rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.

name: the fallow deer
longDescription: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
detailedDescription:
She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes
looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.

name: the brown fox
longDescription: A brown fox is stalking rabbits through the underbrush here.
detailedDescription: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick bushy tail.

name: the bird
longDescription: A large bird with a broken wing has been cornered here.
detailedDescription: The bird isn't going to live much longer, by the looks of it.

name: the bobcat
longDescription: A medium sized bobcat is stalking a bird here.
detailedDescription:
The bobcat has sharp claws and teeth, and will probably eat you instead of
the bird if you give it the chance.

name: the sparrow
longDescription: A sparrow is flapping around by the ground.
detailedDescription: The sparrow looks like it is enjoying life.

name: the robin
longDescription: A robin is hopping around looking for bugs to eat.
detailedDescription: The robin looks quite intent on finding a bug or worm to eat.

name: the squirrel
longDescription: A squirrel is here seeking refuge in its nest.
detailedDescription:
It peers out of its nest at you anxiously, seeming to plead silently with
you to leave it alone.

name: the sleepy badger
longDescription: A furry brown badger is curled up under a log here.
detailedDescription:
The badger is slowly awakening and peering up at you from its burrow. You
know that it won't be moving this slow for long.  Its sharp claws and teeth
catch your attention when you consider killing it.

name: the grey squirrel
longDescription: A grey squirrel with a bushy tail is foraging for nuts here.
detailedDescription:
This happy creature seems to pay you no heed as it goes about its search for
nuts among the leaves and twigs on the ground here.

name: the small chipmunk
longDescription: A small brown-red chipmunk dashes from tree to tree here.
detailedDescription:
The absolute zenith of hyperactivity, this small rodent seems to never tire
of running up, down, and around the trees in this area.  If you could ever
catch it, you imagine it would make an easy meal.

name: the large black crow
longDescription: A large black bird flits about here, picking at bits of carrion.
detailedDescription: The bird eyes you warily, but continues with its meal.

name: the grotesque vulture
longDescription: A grotesque vulture covered in blood and gore is here feeding madly.
detailedDescription:
It sickens you to even look at this foul bird.  Bits of dried gore stick to
its beak, and unidentifiable organs hang from its talons and feathers.
It sees you and attacks, protecting its horrible feast!

name: the young buck
longDescription: A young 5-point buck is drinking from the lake here.
detailedDescription:
This young male deer is drinking from the edge of the lake and watching you
warily.  His antlers are not full size yet, and will no doubt be quite
impressive in a few years.

name: the fish
longDescription: A fish is swimming about here.
detailedDescription: The fish looks about the right size for a meal.

name: the duckling
longDescription: A duckling is swimming around in the pond.
detailedDescription: The duckling is adorable, it looks most of all like a tiny furball.

name: the duck
longDescription: A duck is here, quacking happily.
detailedDescription: The duck is quite fat.  It looks like it is enjoying life.

name: the vicious warg
longDescription: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
detailedDescription:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

name: the ferocious warg
longDescription: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
detailedDescription:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

name: the large, grey wolf
longDescription: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
detailedDescription: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

name: the large, black wolf
longDescription: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
detailedDescription: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

name: the ancient tree
longDescription: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
detailedDescription:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.
Something about it makes you think that this is not a normal oak tree.

The enormous grey trunk shivers slightly, as if sighing deeply.

name: the ancient tree
longDescription: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
detailedDescription:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground.
Something about it makes you think that this is not a normal oak tree.

The enormous grey trunk emits a deep, moaning sound.

name: the green dragon
longDescription: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.
detailedDescription:
This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its
colossal body.  Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as
does the nicks in the horns on its head.  It smells as disgusting as only
dragons do.

name: the huge, poisonous spider
longDescription: A huge, poisonous spider is here.
detailedDescription:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a human crawling on all four.  It
has eight hairy legs that gives it a tremendous speed on almost any surface
and sharp poisonous fangs to paralyze or kill its prey.

name: the Queen spider
longDescription: The huge, bulky Queen spider is here.
detailedDescription:
This disgusting creature is at the size of a small elephant.  It has eight
huge, hairy legs that would give it a tremendous speed on almost any surface
if it wasn't so immensely fat.  Its large, bulbous eyes stare back at you.

name: Shargugh
longDescription: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.
detailedDescription:
This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and
long tangled brown beard.  He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks
as if he is having great fun.

name: the Elder druid
longDescription: The Elder druid is here.  He looks very upset about your presence in his home.
detailedDescription:
The druid looks quite old.  You would think of him as venerable but yet you
know he would be a tough foe.

name: Isha the Dark Elf
longDescription: Isha the Dark Elf is here, observing you silently.
detailedDescription:
She is no less than beautiful, skin as dark as the night and hair
shining like silver in the moonlight.  Her slender body is adorned
with a sleeveless shirt and a short skirt made from black scales
joined with silver threads.  Her back is covered by a large, hooded
cloak as black as her skin and in her broad silver belt hangs a long,
slender sword in a silver scabbard.

name: the deer
longDescription: A deer looks at you with fear in its eyes.
detailedDescription: That is one nice looking deer!

name: the rabbit
longDescription: A small rabbit nibbles at a leaf here.
detailedDescription: It is a small, furry rodent with big ears.

name: the squirrel
longDescription: A squirrel spots you and runs around a tree!
detailedDescription:
It is a small, brown squirrel.  Kind of like a
fuzzy high-tension spring.

name: the orc hunter
longDescription: An orc hunter looks at you with hateful eyes.
detailedDescription:
He looks angry, desperate, and maybe a little sick.
His green skin is definitely mottled, and he seems to
limp a little bit...

name: the orc chief
longDescription: An orc chief growls at you!
detailedDescription:
He wears a crown of oak leaves to show he is a leader.  He
carries a club to show he is a warrior.  You wonder how good
he is at both.

name: the orc woman
longDescription: An orc woman stands here, frightened of you.
detailedDescription:
As you stare her down, she raises her hands slowly, as if to
say, 'Don't kill me'.

name: the orc child
longDescription: An orc child frantically searches for her mother.
detailedDescription: She is raggedy, and seems to be covered with sores.

name: the orc woman
longDescription: A pregnant orc woman tries to stand to flee from you.
detailedDescription:
She is too far gone to move very quickly.  You could
kill her easily.

name: the mutant orc
longDescription: A mutant orc lies here, barely alive.
detailedDescription:
Its body has been twisted beyond all hope.  It is dying, and
nothing will stop that.

name: the mutant orc
longDescription: A horribly mutated orc stands here, gibbering.
detailedDescription:
It doesn't even appear to have registered your arrival... it is
just talking to itself.  Its body is a twisted wreck of orc, man,
beast, and what-not.

name: Elstar
longDescription: An elven wizard is here.  He looks angry.
detailedDescription:
He looks at you archly as he wonders why you have
invaded his domain.  No matter... it shouldn't be
too hard for him to destroy you, no?

name: the elven child
longDescription: An elven child casts his fishing pole into the river.
detailedDescription: He looks young and innocent.  You wonder what he is doing here.

name: the mutant thing
longDescription: A mutant... thing rushes at you!
detailedDescription:
It might've been an orc, once.  Now it is a living terror,
pushing everything out of its way to get at you.

name: the mutant thing
longDescription: A mutant... thing tries to get you, but cannot move into range!
detailedDescription:
It might have been an orc, once.  Now it is a living terror,
pushing everything out of its way to get at you.

name: the young spider
longDescription: The young spider is ballooning by you.
detailedDescription:
He looks freshly hatched and sprightly.  His young fangs are just
growing in as of late.

name: Yevaud
longDescription: Yevaud, the Usurper of Midgaard is here, grinning evilly at you.
detailedDescription: Old, scaly, but still with a lot of bite in him left.

name: the wolf spider
longDescription: The wolf spider is here, licking its bloody fangs.
detailedDescription: The wolf spider is hairy, very hairy.

name: the orc
longDescription: The orc is stuck in the web and he can't get out.
detailedDescription:
You notice an evil look in his eyes, but he seems quite drained of life,
and all he can do is glare at you while he's stuck in this web.

name: the queen wasp
longDescription: The queen wasp is here, thinking how tasty you look.
detailedDescription: You notice a glazed look in her eyes.

name: the drone spider
longDescription: A drone spider walks around doing its master's bidding.
detailedDescription: An ordinary drone spider.

name: the ethereal spider
longDescription: An ethereal spider strides here, traveling to different worlds.
detailedDescription:
She winks in and out of reality.  It looks like it'd be difficult to hit her
without a magical weapon.

name: the slave
longDescription: A human slave of Arachnos works here relentlessly.
detailedDescription:
The slave does not mind you, but will fight like a warrior if attacked.
He serves the spider Empress, Arachnos, though whether it is by choice
or because he was beguiled, you are not fully certain.

name: the quasit
longDescription: A quasit blinks in and out, grinning at you.
detailedDescription:
Demoniac in nature, but more mischievous.  He twiddles his thumbs
and creates a magical treasure!

name: the bird spider
longDescription: The bird spider snaps its powerful jaws.
detailedDescription: The Bird Spider has very powerful jaws.

name: the hermit
longDescription: The hermit sits here and warns, 'Go back before it is too late!'
detailedDescription:
A dishevelled veteran warrior in disguise is what he is, but he
means well.

name: the Donjonkeeper
longDescription: The Donjonkeeper eyes you and wonders how pure your soul is.
detailedDescription:
He delves deeper into you as you stare at him.  Only those free of taint
will be allowed to remain here safely.

name: the guardian
longDescription: The guardian is obviously not doing his job.
detailedDescription: He looks like a lazy bum who sleeps half the time.

name: Arachnos
longDescription: Arachnos the Empress of Spiders welcomes you with an evil smile.
detailedDescription:
She is a very attractive spider with an ornate gown.  She tempts you
into being one of her many slaves.  She does not possess the venomous
fangs of normal spiders, but then, as you realize, she does not need
them.

name: the Ki-Rin
longDescription: The Ki-Rin smiles good-naturedly to you.
detailedDescription:
She is the last bastion of good in this realm.  Her mission is to
someday free the slaves of the Empress.  She has been trapped here for
time eternal, and now the evil power of Arachnos feeds upon her intense
magical energies.  She will never give up here fight against evil,
though, and will continue her work in whatever manner presents itself.

name: the young wormkin
longDescription: A wormkin with no teeth plays here.
detailedDescription: It is a rather small dragon, and you almost feel sad about killing it.

name: the elder wormkin
longDescription: A wormkin that has grown a bit stares at you inquisitively.
detailedDescription:
A medium-sized dragon -- seems it hasn't killed anything yet by itself,
though there is a first time for everything...

name: the mountain goat
longDescription: A mountain goat nibbles at a piece of grass here.
detailedDescription:
This goat is acclimated to the rugged terrain of the
mountains.  It looks at you and shies away a little.

name: the Demon of Decay
longDescription: A cloaked and clawed demon of decay comes at you viciously!
detailedDescription:
This demon has pure malevolence for anything living.
Oops!  You're living!  I guess that means you!

name: the Book Monster
longDescription: A mound of books rise up into a human shape and tries to hit you!
detailedDescription:
Ironically enough, the book-monster's head is War and
Peace.  Hmm.

name: a Bad Feeling
longDescription: A bad feeling chokes your throat.
detailedDescription:
It resembles a lot of other bad feelings you've had,
but a lot more tangible... magic?

name: Your Worst Nightmare
longDescription: Your worst nightmare coalesces in front of you and attacks!
detailedDescription:
It looks like you deepest, darkest fears personified.
Wait a minute!  It IS your deepest, darkest fears
personified!

name: the Guardian
longDescription: A guardian guards the door.  It looks at you and attacks!
detailedDescription:
The guardian guards the door.  That's about all its
brain can handle: guarding.

name: the dwarf guard
longDescription: A dwarven guard is here.
detailedDescription:
The guard looks very tough and mean.  He wears his beard long, and he
smells like he hasn't bathed in over a month.

name: the dwarf worker
longDescription: A dwarven mining worker is here.
detailedDescription: He is very dirty, and looks extremely over-worked.

name: the wraith
longDescription: A wraith is awaiting your first move here.
detailedDescription: A black, almost transparent wraith.

name: the Hide & Tooth storekeeper
longDescription: The Hide & Tooth storekeeper is standing here, waiting patiently.
detailedDescription: The storekeeper is very rotund, but looks in excellent condition.

name: Granite Head the baker
longDescription: Granite Head, the baker, is waiting for a customer here.
detailedDescription: Granite Head is covered with flour and grains.

name: the giant lizard
longDescription: A giant lizard is foraging for food along the cavern floor here.
detailedDescription:
This scaly creature looks like it is well adapted to its underground
habitat.  He looks very powerful.

name: the giant
longDescription: A giant is wandering around the mountainside here.
detailedDescription:
The giant is about 18 feet tall, with arms of steel, and looks in
excellent physical condition.

name: the dwarven mineworker
longDescription: A dwarven mineworker is here.
detailedDescription: The mineworker is very tired, and very dirty, and he has bulging muscles.

name: the mine leader
longDescription: A dwarven mine leader is here, supervising the work.
detailedDescription:
The mine leader is very big and very strong, though he must be fairly
bright also, to have gotten this job.

name: the dwarven doctor
longDescription: The dwarven doctor is here, aiding the sick of his people.
detailedDescription: He is a very skilled healer, and extremely faithful to his god.

name: the dwarven peon
longDescription: A dwarven peon is awaiting help here.

name: the Dwarf
longDescription: A dwarf is here.

name: the barrack guard
longDescription: A barrack guard is here, lounging around while off duty.

name: the mazekeeper
longDescription: A mazekeeper is here.
detailedDescription: He looks VERY tough.

name: the giant snake
longDescription: There is a giant snake here.

name: the horrifying Mudmonster
longDescription: A horrifying Mudmonster is slowly evolving from the mud...
detailedDescription:
It sure looks like something out of a horror movie.  It strongly resembles
a huge figure made up from mud alone, and it sure looks like it had human
flesh for breakfast and is strongly intent on having the same for dinner
- Perhaps you?

name: the small bat
longDescription: The small fierce-looking bat is hanging from the ceiling, obviously sleeping.
detailedDescription:
You have never in your entire life seen such a mean looking small creature,
though it looks rather peaceful, hanging there, sleeping.  The thought of
arousing this cruel creature doesn't sit well in your bones.

name: the sewer rat
longDescription: The huge hungry-looking sewer rat sits here.
detailedDescription:
This creature is fairly large for a rat, but not so big that it could
be called a giant rat.  Sewer water drips off of its grey fur as it
looks at you with black glistening eyes.

name: the small Spider
longDescription: The small hairy Spider is here, busy with its web.
detailedDescription:
This small spider seems to pay you no attention at all as it builds
its intricately designed web.

name: the giant earth beetle
longDescription: The giant, mean-looking earth beetle is here.
detailedDescription:
Now, you've seen beetles, but this one is enormous.  It stretches
perhaps two feet from head to tail.  As it notices you, it waves
its six legs about and makes some strange skittering noises at you.

name: the maggot
longDescription: The giant maggot is here, simply existing.
detailedDescription:
This large mound of grotesque flesh is just lying here quivering,
almost as if it can sense your warm blood nearby.

name: the snake
longDescription: The snake slithers towards you. It looks very mean.
detailedDescription:
This snake is of a variety that you do not recall seeing recently.
It has near black skin with small white diamond shaped spots all
over its head and upper body.  A thin green stripe stretches along
each side of its body.

name: the evil wanderer
longDescription: The evil wanderer stares at you with a piercing gaze.
detailedDescription:
The evil wanderer is very thin.  He is dressed in a grey cloak.  He
doesn't look like he'd be your first choice as a travelling companion.

name: the creature homunculus
longDescription: The creature homunculus is here, looking at you with an evil look.
detailedDescription:
The homunculus appears in a man-like form, about eighteen inches tall,
has a greenish, reptilian skin, leathery wings, and a batlike mouth,
with teeth dripping with a greenish sludge.

name: the shadowy morkoth
longDescription: The morkoth are standing here, waiting for someone to KILL!
detailedDescription:
It is a five foot tall, shadow monster.  This has the shape between
a human and a rat.  It breaths very heavily while staring at you.

name: the evil chr-eff'n
longDescription: The chr-eff'n are crawling here, looking around with its yellow eyes.
detailedDescription:
The head and torso of a chr-eff'n is copper-covered, with yellow,
glowing eyes.  The lower body is in an orange shading.

name: the red dragon
longDescription: The fierce-looking red dragon stares at you angrily.
detailedDescription:
The red dragon stares at you, angrily, as it wakes when you arrive.
It says 'Oh, human YOU woke me up... Hsssss', while it moves closer,
'Can one NEVER sleep in peace... Hssss... '

name: the sea hag
longDescription: A sea hag is here, swimming around.
detailedDescription:
The sea hag is so ghastly looking that you feel the deepest fear:  Big
yellow eyes and sharp teeth.  Its ears are very big, and it has small
sharp horns.  This beast is obviously a hater of beauty.

name: the guardian naga
longDescription: The guardian naga looks kindly at you.
detailedDescription:
The naga are a snake-liked creature.  She is covered in green-gold scales
with silvery triangles along her back.  Her eyes are golden.  She notices
that you are staring at her, and she says 'Watch out.  This way leads to
some evil creatures.'

name: the scaled basilisk
longDescription: The scaled basilisk crawls towards you slowly.
detailedDescription:
The basilisk is a reptilian monster.  It has eight legs, and a strong,
toothy jaws.  It is dull brown with yellowish underbelly.  Its eyes are
glowing pale green.

name: the lemure
longDescription: The lemure blob slithers towards you for an attack!
detailedDescription:
This looks like a vaguely human blob.  Big black yellow eyes, and a mouth
going a little bit out from the face.  The lemure does not look interested
in you at all, but it attacks anyway.  It looks like its mind has been
burned out.

name: Jones 'cruncher' ettin
longDescription: Jones is standing here glaring at you.
detailedDescription:
At the first sight you thought Jones was an Orc, but when he came closer you
see his second head.  He wears an animal skin dress, filthy and moth eaten.
Jones really stinks...

name: Herald 'the mouse-killer' ettin
longDescription: Herald is standing here looking confused at you.
detailedDescription:
When you look at Herald, you feel pity.  His clothes are really poor, and
one of his heads hangs down.  At the rope around his stomach hangs dead
mice and rats.  He does not smell good.

name: the master mindflayer
longDescription: The master mindflayer is here, looking at you with an evil look.
detailedDescription:
It is a seven foot tall humanoid dressed in a purple cloak, and swinging a
black and purple rod above its head as if it was going to attack you any
moment now.  In the middle of its head are four tentacles with sharp points.

name: the senior mindflayer
longDescription: The senior mindflayer walks around here, looking for something useful.
detailedDescription:
This is a horrifying monster indeed, 6'6" high.  Dressed in purple and black,
and carrying a large mace in its hand.  In the center of its head are four
large tentacles with very sharp points.

name: the junior mindflayer
longDescription: The junior mindflayer is here, watching you carefully from the corner.
detailedDescription:
This mindflayer is six feet high.  It has a small mace in its belt, and is
dressed in purple and black cloth.  It has four small tentacles in the center
of its head.

name: the ugly wererat
longDescription: An ugly wererat is here, looking at you with a strange flick in his eyes.
detailedDescription:
The wererat is about four feet tall.  It looks very much like rat, except
that it is standing.

name: the gigantic rat
longDescription: There is a gigantic rat here, looking at you with a hungry look.
detailedDescription:
The gigantic rat is about ten feet long from head to tail and has claws the
size of your head, looking very nasty.

name: the Grand Knight of Paladins
longDescription: The Grand Knight is standing here, waiting for someone to help.
detailedDescription:
The Knight is standing here, smiling at you.  He is dressed all in white,
blue and silver.  He looks VERY strong, as he stands here, ready to help
the innocent.

name: the large rat
longDescription: There is a large rat here, poking through the foodstuffs lying around.
detailedDescription:
The large rat is about two feet long from head to tail and has claws the
size of your fingers, looking very nasty.  It seems to be quite occupied
with all the chewed open foodstuffs lying about the room.

name: the Cleaver
longDescription: The Cleaver is here eyeing you hungrily in anticipation of its next meal.
detailedDescription:
The Cleaver is a huge spidery chittinous creature with four large
spindly arms ending in cleaverlike talons that will surely cut you
to ribbons.

name: the adjudicator
longDescription: An adjudicator is watching the games intently.
detailedDescription:
The adjudicator is a retired gladiator and scars cover all exposed parts of
his body.  Although he is getting on in years, he remains healthy and fit.

name: the scorekeeper
longDescription: A scorekeeper has one eye on his stopwatch and the other on a clipboard.
detailedDescription:
The scorekeeper is a young man of about 25 years of age and is very intently
studying his clipboard.

name: the spectator
longDescription: A spectator is here watching the games.
detailedDescription: The spectator is filthy, half drunk and screaming his head off.

name: the nobleman
longDescription: A nobleman stands here looking aloof.
detailedDescription:
The nobleman is dressed in fine clothes and jewelry and has a very snobbish
attitude.  While he is getting old and his hair and beard are streaked with
gray, he is by no means an easy target.

name: the slave
longDescription: A slave stands here, wishing that she was free.
detailedDescription:
A very pretty young woman who was captured instead of being killed when
the Roman legions subjugated her land.

name: the gladiator
longDescription: There is a gladiator standing here.
detailedDescription:
A well muscled man who is very heavily armored and armed to the teeth.  He
lives for combat.

name: the chariot driver
longDescription: There is a chariot driver here.
detailedDescription:
You see a very slight and small individual whose whole life is centered around
nothing but horses and speed.

name: the coach
longDescription: There is a coach standing here, going over last minute strategy.
detailedDescription:
As you try to look over his shoulder and listen in on his mumbling,
he looks up at you and gives you a glare that chills you to the
bone.

name: the healer
longDescription: A healer is standing here.
detailedDescription:
You see a young man, still learning about magical healing, wearing a white
coat and using a stethoscope.

name: the herbalist
longDescription: There is a beautiful young lady here, carrying herbs to help the healer with.
detailedDescription:
The herbalist is a very beautiful young lady who is about 22 years old.  She
has deep brown eyes and shoulder-length chestnut hair.  Her body is perfectly
proportioned and she stands about 5' 5" tall.

name: Titus' shopkeeper
longDescription: Titus' shopkeeper is here, minding the store.
detailedDescription:
The shopkeeper is an older man in his middle to late fifties and looks like
he enjoys the quiet life.  There is a long scar running from the edge of his
mouth to his right ear, making it look like he is always smiling.

name: the peddler
longDescription: A poor peddler is standing here, trying to support his meager existence.
detailedDescription: You see a small, dirty man who doesn't look very healthy.

name: the page
longDescription: A page stands here, waiting to run an errand.
detailedDescription:
You see a young boy who looks very strong and very fast.  He has the look of
a scholar about him.

name: the plaintiff
longDescription: The plaintiff stands here, pleading his case.
detailedDescription: He looks pitiful.  Absolutely pitiful.

name: the ticket master
longDescription: A ticket master is here, looking at you expectantly.
detailedDescription:
He seems to be waiting for you to either buy a ticket or to get out
of his way so that he can sell tickets to people that actually want
them.

name: the stadium vendor
longDescription: A stadium vendor is walking here, selling overpriced hotdogs and beer.
detailedDescription:
The vendor is a scruffy looking man who isn't afraid of a fight and looks
like he has had just about enough of smart-mouthed spectators.

name: the citizen
longDescription: A citizen of Rome is standing here.
detailedDescription: It appears to be your ordinary citizen going about his business.

name: the gateguard
longDescription: A gateguard stands here, tending the gate.
detailedDescription: You see a strong, loyal public defender.

name: the soldier
longDescription: A soldier on leave is walking around looking for entertainment.
detailedDescription:
You see a member of one of the Emperor's elite legions.  He looks VERY strong.
You have this vague feeling that his entertainment isn't going to be a very
wholesome activity.

name: Julius Caesar
longDescription: Julius Caesar, the Emperor of Rome, is sitting here.
detailedDescription:
You see a man who is dressed in the finest of clothes, has eaten the best of
foods and lived in the most opulent palace that Rome has ever known.

name: the royal bodyguard
longDescription: There is a royal bodyguard here, ready to die for the Emperor, if necessary.
detailedDescription:
The bodyguard is dressed in the finest of armor and wields only the
deadliest of weapons.  He is very strong and would put up one hell
of a fight.  He has been trained to be suspicious of all but the
most innocent visitors, and likely to take offense of anyone with
less than pure intentions.

name: the judge
longDescription: A judge is standing here, reading a case.
detailedDescription:
He seems to be quite interested in the case, perhaps you shouldn't
disturb him now, later would probably be a better time.

name: the master scheduler
longDescription: The master scheduler is here, writing in an appointment book.
detailedDescription:
As you look at him, he looks up at you and asks, 'Do you have an
appointment?'  He waits for a few seconds and then asks, 'Would
you like one?'

name: the slimeball
longDescription: A green ball of slime is hanging over you, oozing downward.
detailedDescription: There is a green 'ball' of slime oozing from the coating on the walls.

name: Froboz
longDescription: Froboz the wizard is standing here, working on a new spell.
detailedDescription:
You see a middle-aged man whose knowledge of magic, both offensive and
defensive, is legendary.  He literally glows with a pink aura.

name: Titus Andronicus
longDescription: Titus Andronicus is standing here, polishing a few swords.
detailedDescription:
As you look at him, he suddenly swings a newly sharpened sword
at you!  Watch out!

name: the senator
longDescription: A senator is here, waiting for debate to begin.
detailedDescription: He seems to be quite bored and is playing with the edge of his toga.

name: the bailiff
longDescription: The bailiff stands here, keeping order in the courtroom.
detailedDescription:
He is a very stern man and insists on absolute quiet in his courtroom
unless the judge has given someone permisson to speak.

name: the defendant
longDescription: The defendant stands here, pleading her case.
detailedDescription: She looks to be well organized and full of confidence.

name: Jupiter
longDescription: Jupiter, King of the Gods, is watching over his realm here.
detailedDescription:
He is the strongest of the Gods, and certainly no easy mark!  His powers
transcend the plane of the physical, and could easily kill an unprepared
mortal.

name: Venus
longDescription: Venus, the Goddess of Beauty and Knowledge, is resting here.
detailedDescription:
Venus is probably one of the most beautiful women you have ever seen
if not THE most beautiful.  She is very powerful and tough under that
outer image of beauty.

name: Mars
longDescription: Mars, the God of War and State, is sitting down here.
detailedDescription:
Mars is a tall God with burning, hateful eyes and a large scowl on
his face.

name: Mercury
longDescription: Mercury, the messenger of the Gods, is standing here.
detailedDescription: Mercury is a handsome, youthful God and wears a large grin on his face.

name: Froboz' shopkeeper
longDescription: Froboz' shopkeeper is here, minding the store.
detailedDescription:
The shopkeeper is an older man in his middle to late fifties and looks like
he enjoys the quiet life.  There is a long scar running from the edge of his
mouth to his right ear, making it look like he is always smiling.

name: the executioner
longDescription: The executioner stands here, waiting to torture some sorry soul.
detailedDescription:
You see a burly man who is wearing a black hood that obscures his face.  He
has a very sadistic attitude and clearly loves his work.

name: the baker
longDescription: The baker looks at you calmly, wiping flour from his face with one hand.
detailedDescription:
A fat, nice looking baker.  But you can see that he has many scars on his
body.

name: the grocer
longDescription: A grocer stands at the counter, with a slightly impatient look on his face.
detailedDescription: A tall grocer, who moves two 200 pounds bag of flour around on his shoulders.

name: Gwydion
longDescription: Gwydion the Royal Guard is here on duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Gwydion wears the chain mail required
of them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like an
experienced fighter.

name: King Welmar
longDescription: The wise King Welmar sits here in his throne.
detailedDescription:
In his later middle-age, with his beard starting to grey, King Welmar
is still very powerfully built, and wouldn't take kindly to an attack.
Despite that, you know he is well-loved throughout the land, and has
a reputation as a wise and just ruler.

name: the horrible ghost
longDescription: You hear a frightening wail, and see a horrible ghost approaching.
detailedDescription: The ghost is almost translucent, and looks really SCARY!

name: Jim
longDescription: Jim the Royal Guard is here on duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Jim wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like an
experienced fighter.

name: Brian
longDescription: Brian the Royal Guard is here, training with the Master.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Brian wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like an
experienced fighter.

name: Mick
longDescription: Mick the Royal Guard is here, training with the Master.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Mick wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like an
experienced fighter.

name: Matt
longDescription: Matt the Royal Guard is here on duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Matt wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like an
experienced fighter.

name: Jochem
longDescription: Jochem the Royal Guard sits here, off duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Jochem wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like a fighter
who has seen more than one battle, and longs to see the next!

name: Anne
longDescription: Anne the Royal Guard is here on duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Anne wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  She seems very well trained, and moves like a fighter
who has seen more than one battle, and longs to see the next!

name: Andrew
longDescription: Andrew the Royal Guard is here on duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Andrew wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like a fighter
who has seen more than one battle, and longs to see the next!

name: Bertram
longDescription: Bertram the Royal Guard is here on duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Bertram wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and carries his scars
with pride.  This guy seems tough...

name: Jeanette
longDescription: Jeanette the Royal Guard is here on duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Jeanette wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  She seems very well trained, and carries her scars
with pride.  This girl could be nasty if she wanted to...

name: Peter, the Captain of the Royal Guard
longDescription: Peter, the Captain of the Royal Guard, walks around inspecting.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Peter wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  Even though all the other guards seem well trained,
you realise none of them would stand a chance against this man in a
fight.  He stands at least two metres tall, but still moves with an
almost feline grace.  He actually radiates strength and confidence,
and you have to fight a sudden urge to come to attention as you see
him.

name: the Training Master
longDescription: The Training Master is here, supervising.
detailedDescription:
Aged, but experienced, the Training Master is skilled in the use
of virtually every weapon type invented by Man.

name: the Royal Herald
longDescription: The Royal Herald is standing here.
detailedDescription:
This is a young, powerfully built man, whose primary function
is to make Royal Announcements.

name: Ergan the Murderer
longDescription: Slumped in a corner you see Ergan, aka the Murderer of Townsbridge.
detailedDescription:
You remember a time almost a decade ago, when the news of the day
was how this man had slaughtered the entire population of the little
village of Townsbridge.  He was imprisoned, and here he is - a shadow
of the undoubtedly great warrior he once was, but still to be reckoned
with.

name: James the Butler
longDescription: James the Butler is standing here, looking pompous.
detailedDescription:
The typical perfect butler: upper middle age, a bit bald and with
an impressive belly.

name: the Cleaning Woman
longDescription: There is a Cleaning Woman here, trying not be noticed.
detailedDescription: Although she has a menial job, she seems to like it.

name: the cockroach
longDescription: A large cockroach is crawling by the wall.
detailedDescription: Very large indeed, and they say cockroaches are hard to kill...

name: the Astrologer
longDescription: The Astrologer is sitting here, studying a book.
detailedDescription:
He is old and white-haired, with a long beard.  As you see him,
you can almost believe the rumours about stars deciding Fate,
and that astrology is capable of seeing the future.

name: Tim, the King's Lifeguard
longDescription: Tim, the King's Lifeguard, is standing here.
detailedDescription:
This guy looks just like his twin, Tom.  There seems to be no
doubt that he is completely prepared to give his life for the
King, if necessary.

name: Tom, the King's Lifeguard
longDescription: Tom, the King's Lifeguard, is standing here.
detailedDescription:
This guy looks just like his twin, Tim.  There seems to be no
doubt that he is completely prepared to give his life for the
King, if necessary.

name: the Chef
longDescription: The Chef is here, shouting orders to the other cooks.
detailedDescription:
It seems he has been tasting his own food a bit too enthusiastically.
He is, in other words, a bit fat.

name: the cook
longDescription: There is a cook here, making himself busy with a pot.
detailedDescription: A junior cook, eager to do the Chef's bidding.

name: David
longDescription: David, a big, mean-looking man, stands here, guarding the door.
detailedDescription:
He really is big, and you get the feeling he wouldn't take kindly
to an attempt to get past him.

name: Dick
longDescription: Dick, a big, mean-looking man, stands here, guarding the door.
detailedDescription:
He really is big, and you get the feeling he wouldn't take kindly
to an attempt to get past him.

name: Jerry
longDescription: Jerry the Royal Guard is here off duty, playing dice.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Jerry wears the chain mail required
of them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like
an experienced fighter.

name: Michael
longDescription: Michael the Royal Guard is here off duty, playing dice.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Michael wears the chain mail required
of them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like an
experienced fighter.

name: Hans
longDescription: Hans the Royal Guard is here on duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Hans wears the chain mail required
of them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and moves like
a fighter who has seen more than one battle, and longs to see
the next!

name: Boris
longDescription: Boris the Royal Guard is here on duty.
detailedDescription:
As all members of the Guard, Boris wears the chain mail required of
them as uniform.  He seems very well trained, and carries his scars
with pride.  This guy seems tough...

name: the zombie
longDescription: A zombie is shambling over some corpses here, moving quite silently.
detailedDescription:
It is entirely possible that this zombie was once one of the villagers
of Townsbridge who has been brought to an undead life by a fuelling
desire for revenge.

name: the skeleton
longDescription: A skeleton is moving about with a loud clatter here, climbing over corpses.
detailedDescription:
It is entirely possible that this skeleton was once one of the villagers
of Townsbridge who has been brought to an undead life by a fuelling desire
for revenge.

name: the pit fiend
longDescription: A large demon surrounded by flames rises out of the dark pool.
detailedDescription:
It is a horrifying thing, this demonic creature from the depths of the
Abyss.  It glares down at you through blood-red eyes, and bares its huge
white fangs and its razor-sharp talons.

name: the pit beast
longDescription: The big, ugly pit-beast is standing here sizing you up.
detailedDescription:
Ick... what a disgusting creature!  It is black and green and slimy
and it is drooling everywhere... looks mean too.

name: the newbie monster
longDescription: The newbie monster stands here looking confused.  Kill him!  Kill him!
detailedDescription:
What an odd looking little beast.  He looks harmless, but you never can
tell.  He is only about 4 feet tall, but he pretty muscular looking...
maybe you should ask if he needs help?  Nah... kill him.

name: the baby dragon
longDescription: Someone's little pet dragon has gotten loose, and is sniffing about here.
detailedDescription:
Awwww... how cute!  A little baby dragon.  He's about 3 feet long and you
just want to cuddle him to death... no, you really want to kill him to tell
the truth.  But, remember, even a little dragon can be a big problem.

name: the Newbie Guard
longDescription: The Newbie Guard is here wondering where that dragon went.
detailedDescription:
The Guard also had the job of taking care of the Alchemist's pet dragon,
but he doesn't seem to be doing a good job of it.  He looks at you and
says, 'Have you seen that dragon?  Master will have my head if I don't find
him.'

name: the Newbie Alchemist
longDescription: The Newbie Alchemist is here trying to make something.
detailedDescription:
He is a funny looking, furry little dude.  He looks really busy trying to
mix up a batch of something or other.

name: the creepy crawler
longDescription: A creepy little crawling thing is scuttling along the floor at your feet.
detailedDescription:
Yuck!  If they'd ever clean this place maybe it wouldn't attract vermin
like this disgusting, little, six-legged, brown bug.

name: the zombiefied newbie
longDescription: A VERY gaunt looking newbie... it looks like a zombie!
detailedDescription:
This guy has been lost in here too long... it is more zombie than man
now.  You would feel sorry for it, but it is moving in to attack!

name: the quasit
longDescription: A funny little imp-like thing (a quasit perhaps?) is sneaking about here.
detailedDescription:
Little green, vaguely humoniod shaped creature, with a long pointed tail.
It is hard to say because before you ever get a good look at it, it darts
back into the shadows.

name: the massive Minotaur
longDescription: The Great Minotaur is wondering just what you'll taste like.
detailedDescription:
A massive man, with the head of a bull.  He looks as strong as bull too,
but not nearly as smart.  Actually, now that you consider it... he looks
a heck of a lot meaner than any bull you have ever seen... and he is
coming this way!

name: the dark spectre
longDescription: The dark spectre is lurking in the shadows.
detailedDescription:
The soul of a long since passed on adventurer... it lurks here waiting for
a chance to bring death to any who cross its path.

name: the annoying newbie
longDescription: A newbie is here annoying the hell out of you.
detailedDescription:
What a jerk!  He won't shut up, and he keeps making the most irritating
comments about everything.  Better silence him with cold, tempered steel
MUHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!

name: the clueless newbie
longDescription: A newbie is here looking terribly confused.
detailedDescription:
What a moron!  Every question that is answered in the help files, he will
ask and he will probably ask 2 or 3 times too.  This guy just doesn't get
it, best put him out of his misery.

name: the talkative newbie
longDescription: A newbie is here talking a lot.
detailedDescription:
Well, at least this gal seems pretty cool.  Talks a lot, but she's a
friendly, interesting sort.  Seems to have a clue what she's doing also,
unlike some others you might see.

name: the lost newbie
longDescription: A newbie is here wandering about aimlessly.
detailedDescription:
Hmmm... looks like he has been around a while, but he wandered a little
too far from home this time.  Don't think he knows quite where he is,
maybe you should help him out?

name: the smart newbie
longDescription: A newbie is here, and he looks quite sure of himself.
detailedDescription:
Here is a guy who has it all together.  Nice equipment too, must have read
the help files, Eh?
